Reviews.Content: Excellent location and rooms... was pleasantly surprised with the location, its very convenient if you want to be shopping on Orchard Road... Staff is very friendly and courteous... Very well equipped rooms......

Reviews.Title: “REALLY Good for business travel”
Reviews.Author: TravelEeOrr
Reviews.Content: One of favorite hotels in Singapore. Walking distance from fabulous shopping and food. It's not the fancies hotel I've ever stayed but it does everything well.

Reviews.Title: “Cosy & Homy”
Reviews.Author: Timbermad
Reviews.Content: Went here for a business trip. Located close to orchard Rd. Stay for a simple room yet its quite spacious for a single business trip. Room was very cosy & homy. Terrific ambient & setting of beds, furniture & the bathroom was wonderful. I have a great view of the road from outside my room. I really love the room. The temperature quite cold even though already of the air condition. The price wise was ok & understandable due to its location. I will come back again if i come on a business trip. If family, i might think twice :). The taxi always confuse on the location of the hotel so need to give exact address to them. Overall.. I love it..

Reviews.Title: “Awful front desk, professional executive lounge”
Reviews.Author: Bekes
Reviews.Content: We are platinum club member and we booked an executive room for a 10-day stay in this hotel. The hotel was in good location, clean and comfortable. Yet, the front desk staff (rude and impolite, simply unprofessional, we could hardly believe how rude we were treated) can really drag down the overall impression about this hotel and our overall stay. This mentioned, we found the staff in executive lounge very professional and helpful, so they compensated for the awful attitude we had with the front desk staff.

Reviews.Title: “great location!”
Reviews.Author: Peatsway
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 1 night as a stopover, very nice, clean, modern rooms and the location was fantastic, closeto restaurants and the huge shopping malls!! We'll stay there again...

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Great Price”
Reviews.Author: bakem
Reviews.Content: Great hotel - only a short walk to Orchard Road. Fantastic service. Rooms were quiet - however views were not spectacular. Would recommend to stay here for price and location.

Reviews.Title: “was impressed with the service”
Reviews.Author: carolyn m
Reviews.Content: We arrived early in August for 3 nights and also early in the day around 8am. After a relatively tiring flight was wondering what we were going to do for 6 hours before we could check in.Was not in the mood for running around just wanted to sleep. What a surprise to be informed that our room was ready and we had been upgraded to an executive floor. It felt fantastic to be looked after so well. The staff were helpful and friendly and i would recommend this hotel to others and would stay there again. Its also very close to Orchard Road and easy to get around Singapore from there. Enjoyed the pool as well.

Reviews.Title: “Not value for mooney!”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeExRN
Reviews.Content: Just back from a week here on business. Hotel was up to it's usual high standards --- however £2000 for a week in a fairly non descrip room - I don't think it was good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Great place - no hesitatation in going back & recommending”
Reviews.Author: Asho111
Reviews.Content: Truly great location, right by the bustling shopping street of Orchard Road, but not noisy in the rooms and the pool is great. We only stayed three nights, but was a perfect stopover place and we'll be back everytime we stop over in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed”
Reviews.Author: AbbyMarlborough_NZ
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Orchard Road Holiday Inn at the beginning of August and could not fault it. The room was recently reburbished and was spacious, immaculate and comfortable. The front staff went out of their way to make our stay a good one even bringing us out bottles of water while we were sitting waiting for the bus to take us to the zoo for breakfast. They really couldn't have been more helpful.The concierges too were always there to help and give advise. Late check out wasn't a problem and we were given soft drinks and the facilities to use whilst waiting for the late plane to the UK. The rooftop pool is huge and kept in very good condition. Great to have a swim after the days activities. There are a strip of good restaurants nearby and the shops are just around the corner, so very handy to everything. One of the nicest hotels we stayed at during our weeks away.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good value”
Reviews.Author: mirikiwi
Reviews.Content: Family of 3, 2 adults, 1 child, stayed here over Easter for 4 nights. We had a deluxe room which had two double beds. It was a good size for the 3 of us we didn't feel crowded. It was a great location, with a good variety of restaurants just across the street out of the back entrance. Close proximity to the train station which made it easy to go to many places. Also just a block away from the main shopping street in Singapore. The staff were very pleasant and helpfull. Check in was smooth and we were told we would receive something extra so the receptionist asked our son to choose from 3 cards and we received free wi-fi service for the length of our stay. Overall for the price we paid we found this place to be very good value and a very pleasant place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Pompeyman
Reviews.Content: Three of us stayed as a family (3 adults) for 6 days, including the Formula 1 Grand Prix. Check-in was very easy and we were given an extended check-out time of 2pm, which was useful as our flight out of Singapore was after 11pm. We were also offered buffet breakfast at 22 SGD per day in advance instead of the normal 33 SGD and it was one of the best buffet breakfasts we have ever had, with a wide range of Asian and Western choices. Staff were friendly and service was excellent. The room was of a high standard with two comfortable (firm) double beds and the price was very good value, especially considering the Formula 1 timing, although we found the in-room internet a bit expensive at effectively 30 SGD per day (we've stayed at other hotels in South East Asia with free in-room wi-fi). This is not where we normally stay in Singapore but we were very pleased with it and we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Return visit”
Reviews.Author: Miran_Ali
Reviews.Content: I avoided this hotel for the last few years as it was run down and shabby. I am pleased to say that the renovations are now complete and this is a proper five star hotel. Ok, the lobby bar still needs work but that's splitting hairs. The only room worth taking are the Executive Club rooms. Especially if you have kids and are on holiday in Singapore. Lots of space and the Club Lounge for breakfast. Officially breakfast closes at 10.30am, but you can walk in at 10.45-11.00 am and still catch the buffet. I didn't get a chance to see the pool. I'll definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great For Families”
Reviews.Author: EF_MKE
Reviews.Content: Stayed in a room with 2 double beds, so it was really great for family travelers (Traveled with hubby and 3 kids - 11, 8 and 5). Check in and check out were really quick. All I did was show them my confirmation slip from hotels.com, and I was immediately ushered to the room. The finishing in the room was very good, and gave an air of luxury. The welcome drink, fruit basket and chocolates were a nice touch too! Flat screen TV was great, with good channel selections. The pillow selection availability was also a nice luxurious touch. Location was really good too, as it was right on Orchard Road. Cabs are easily available if need to go anywhere else. Not sure about the food, coz didn't get to sample them as they were not halal. But saw plenty of people dining there, so perhaps it was good :-). Will definitely consider again if planning another trip into Singapore city with the family.

Reviews.Title: “Great for families”
Reviews.Author: paulksyin
Reviews.Content: Great for families, friendly & helpful staff who went out of their way to get us Universal Studios tickets, convenient location on the more affordable end of Orchard Road shopping street, close enough to the action but still quiet, some cosy eateries across the lane, and close to Somerset MRT station.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: psmith60
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in July on our first visit to Singapore, and were very impressed with the quality. The hotel appeared to be recently renovated and the lobby and our room furnishings were very contemporary and impressive. We were travelling with our two children aged 10 and 12, and although we only booked a standard room for our stopover, our room was larger than normal and we were provided with a complimentary trundle bed. We all took advantage of the pillow menu! The pool area was lovely and extremely well furnished. The concierge was most helpful with advice and the hotel was in a great location, and very quiet. Having just stayed for a week at a Holiday Inn in Hong Kong, the Holiday Inn Singapore was a nice surprise.

Reviews.Title: “excellent personal attention”
Reviews.Author: MalaysiaDeepee
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a few times and always found the staff pleasant, attentive and caring. My family and I are particularly impressed with the staff at the executive floor and lounge who are always helpful and ready to assist you. Staff like Ms Lee Kee should be highly commended for their dedication to service and pleasing guests promptly. Further, this hotel, although located closely to the busy and noisy Orchard Road, is surprisingly quiet, unlike other similar hotels in the vicinity. Generally clean and conveniently located.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: bluesque
Reviews.Content: If you are into shopping, Orchard street is the best destination for you. There are also several bus stops, a MRT stop, and many food courts in the area. There are several taylors right beside the hotel as well in case you want to have a suit made. The hotel itself is beautiful, the service - impeccable. The rooms are spasious, clean, and well appointed. The bathroom was convenient and functional, the bed was comfy, and the temperature control was great.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: YG1978
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very conveniently located next to Orchard road, but not directly on it, which provides a quiet, confortable stay. The hotel is very clean, both in the public areas and the rooms. My room was very spacious and comfortable, and the bed was huge. The breakfast served was nice and the freshly quizzed (to order!) juices were awesome. Overall a very pleasant stay at a very reasonable (for Singapore) price.

Reviews.Title: “Average Stay”
Reviews.Author: Kuttan1969
Reviews.Content: Room small compared to other hotels, carpet old, bathroom also small. Service and staff makes this hotel good. Location walkable to Orchard Road but out of any attraction. MRT is also little bit far.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel to spend a quiet bday”
Reviews.Author: ekek888
Reviews.Content: we booked 2 rooms for 4 nights and had a great time. they sent a bottle of good wine and a birthday cake [very good]. we were taken cared off very well. the hotel from the looks of it has been fully refurbished. the room is on the small side but adequate, very clean and modern. bed is fantastic. tv is lcd big. coffee and tea is free the usual in this class of hotel. the room we were in is wheelchair accessible. it has automatic doors incl the toilet. the location is one one end of orchard, very near the central shopping area, a few minutes walk. the only thing i can really complain is that internet is expensive. another is the buffet is not that good. but overall will stay there again and recommend it to others,

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, fantastic, fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Dragons11
Reviews.Content: This was the first time I had stayed at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, but my fiancee had previously stayed with the hotel and highly recommended it. I can understand why he recommended it, because it is truly a great place to stay. Not only is it a stones throw away from Orchard Road, but is close to the MRT at Somerset. For me, it was fantastic as I am a shopper and to walk out of the Holiday Inn onto Orchard Road within a couple of minutes was just unreal. Now back to the Holiday Inn, the breakfast buffet was great and provided a good mix of food - in fact it was great trying something each day. We stayed at the Holiday Inn for a week and the service and staff were very accommodating. The two older men that greeted us at the entrance to the Holiday Inn were amazing and I think they must have worked at the Holiday Inn for a long time - never did I not see a smile on their faces. The only minor negative, was that our room did smell a little musty, but I think this was because it was so muggy and humid outside that the air conditioning inside was compensating for this. It wasn't an overly offensive smell, but was noticeable. On our next visit we will definitely stay here again and will try the upgrade to the Executive Club. Holiday Inn you made our week in Singapore a delight and we will be back to see you :)

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: lwo
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with our time at this Hotel. Easy walk to Orchard Road, and Somerset rail station and close to local cafes and restaurants. The Hotel has two restaurants on the premises, and provided a very good breakfast selection which was included in our stay. The staff, front desk, lounge and restaurants, were invariably charming and helpful and seemed to genuinely want to make our stay a pleasant one..

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and nice !”
Reviews.Author: X-O75
Reviews.Content: This is a good example of the new style provided by Holiday Inn : contemporary and nicely made. Room were confortable and nicely decorated. The hotel location is very good, walking distance (3 minutes) from Orchard road. Service is very good as often in Singapore ! Lots of restaurants with different cuisines around the hotel, make things easy when you don't want to eat at the hotel itself. Good place for a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Choice!”
Reviews.Author: wandermum
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel from 17 Aug to the 21st. I'm so glad that I chose Holiday Inn Orchard. I booked 2months in advance, and they gave all the requests I asked for. We were even given complimentary minibar (drinks only) by reservations as it was our anniversary. This is a big plus - we didn't need to buy bottled water outside or other drinks AT ALL. the drinks in the minibar were replenished everyday & was more than sufficient. From the reservations dept to front desk to executive lounge to housekeeping - service was excellent. We were traveling with a 17 month old who got sick when we arrived in Singapore, and they really took care of us. They sent us to their affiliate GP clinic to get meds for the baby & everyday they'd check up on how we were all doing. Breakfast was included in the rate we paid and was very good value. We ate breakfast once at the executive lounge but preferred the restaurant on the 2nd flr as the spread was more extensive - all you can think of having for breakfast. This kept us from going hungry until afternoon. Again, for booking early, the hotel website had a promo of complimentary late checkout til 4pm, which was great since our flight was @ 6:45pm. I think we got more for the price we paid. Checkout took less than 5mins, and we paid nothing more. no hidden charges. some impt info: 1. taxi to almost all the places we went to was cheap, we didn't need to take the mrt esp traveling with a baby -Taxi from airport only cost us $18sgd (we arrived at 6am in singapore); Taxi going to airport (around 3pm) cost $20sgd 2. laundry service "Laundry Day" in cuppage plaza just behind the hotel is cheap but clean. we paid $12sgd for 3.5kg of laundry 3. food during breakfast was labelled halal or non halal. I cannot say enough to compliment this hotel, they love their jobs and they do it well. We just got home but we're thinking of going back again!

Reviews.Title: “Very central and well appointed.”
Reviews.Author: BillandBeryl
Reviews.Content: After arriving after a 6 hour delay in Melbourne airport, and nearly 11pm it was a delight to get into the well appointed and comfortable room. We were on the 5th floor although being tired there was a nightclub going quite noisy and could hear traffic and noise in the morning. Would stay again. Staff all friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Recommended”
Reviews.Author: zza007
Reviews.Content: Comfortable hotel with friendly staff. Can be compared to many 5 star hotels. A very short safe walk to Orchard Rd. I would definately stay here again. And the price was reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Singapore Stay”
Reviews.Content: I have only a few words. We as a family loved this hotel. We will stay here the next time we go to singapore. most likely only stay here. It is a great family hotel. My kids were 10 and 12 then.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice staffs”
Reviews.Author: DOBK
Reviews.Content: The hotel location is very good, near all the major shopping area in Singapore. To get good cheap and good food are not a problem. Friendly and helpful staffs at lobby. The room is clean and tidy with full amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and service”
Reviews.Author: Dandor
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel numerous times during the last 5 years. The location is great close to Orchard Road with many shopping and restaurants. As a Platinum member I frequently was upgraded to a suite and enjoy the extra perks. Breakfast is amazing as well as the Indian restaurant in the basement - highly recommended! I also love the roof top pool very handy after a long flight or work at the office

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sriram_aca
Reviews.Content: I, my wife and our six years old daughter were visiting Singapore during May 2011. After a lot of thought, we chose to stay at Holiday Inn, Orchard City Center. Its a great place to stay. The rooms were spacious with a separate bed for our daughter. A very centrally located hotel, very close to Orchard Road and just about less than ten minutes from the nearest train station. The overall service was very good although we spent some time during check in and check out. It could have been smoother. Next, the Indian restaurant only took orders for room service till 10.30PM and was operational till 11PM. So, if you missed to order by 10.30PM, you cant get the Indian food. A great place to stay and would definitely like to go back.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back ;)”
Reviews.Author: bubble2381
Reviews.Content: For someone who works in hotel industry myself, I'm very picky about hotel cleanliness and service. But after renovating Holiday Inn Orchard is a lot fresher. Room was very nice and clean. Amenities are surely sufficient. Staff very professional and friendly not unlike some hotels that are polite but cold and have "couldn't care less" attitude. Location is the one of the best. Close enough to city center but not too close to make it too crowded. We'll surely come back again for our holiday :)

Reviews.Title: “Great service, comfortable beds.”
Reviews.Author: plateman01
Reviews.Content: The orchard holiday inn is a quality hotel. Staff are totally professional and always helpful. The hotel is close to major subway links and big shopping malls. The standard room was fine with a great bathroom and comfortable bedding. The swimming pool and sauna centre are first rate.

Reviews.Title: “Garden hotel in Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: riya73
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel and was impressed with its lush green surroundings. Located in one end of Orchard Rd, the main shopping and tourist area in Singapore, the hotel has a very charming lobby and is very handy to restaurants and shopping centres. Upon check in, I was given a warm welcome and my request for a high floor room was honoured immediately. I was surprised at how quickly the porter brought my luggage to the room. I went for a walk nearby and not too comfortable with the humid temperatures, I decided to relax at the poolside. It was very refreshing, looking at the green trees and gardens and having a swim in the warm waters in the shining blue pool. A nice refreshing glass of fresh watermelon and orange juice with a slice of lemon enhanced the experience. The in room dining offered some authentic Malaysia dishes such as Satay, Mee Goreng and Chicken Curry with rice.The breakfast next morning was excellent, with a wide range of Asian dishes, including noodles as well as western continental items. The danish pastries were excellent. This hotel is a very good and convenient option for travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: ucartech
Reviews.Content: Stay at this hotel for two nights and we really enjoyed it. The room was cozy and clean. The location is excellent near the Orchard Road. Breakfast is modest one. It will be one of many hotels in SIngapore that we will return to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “My wife and I always love the experience and that's why we keep coming back!”
Reviews.Author: RonAye
Reviews.Content: Great experience especially in the Executive Club Lounge with world class service being provided by Mia Y. Padiernos / Chieng Lee Kee and their fantastic team comprising of people like Harry, Komal, Nadeeka, Sheena, Cyra, Danielle and Paula to name a few. The Executive Club Lounge is, I feel, a world of its own with extremely friendly and ever smiling staff...... the best part being that this is a totally professional outfit who seem to have mastered the art of customer service! I strongly recommend that you experience this experience to know what I am talking about.... you will never regret it!! This experience will not be complete without mentioning the Lobby Lounge & Bar with excellent service being provided by Kumar, Jerry, Valerie and Arra.... Great and thank you all for making our stay so comfortable and homely!!

Reviews.Title: “One word to sum up this hotel”
Reviews.Author: VictorMeldrewAgain
Reviews.Content: Excellent, but I have to use 50 characters for a review here so have added a few extra words

Reviews.Title: “Sure i will come back!”
Reviews.Author: cindygalas
Reviews.Content: Actually i did not stay really at HISOCC. I just had my oJT there and based on my experience since i worked there for 1 year, its true that all the staffs are providing quality service to the guest, Hisocc has a nice restaurants, good food, & friendly employees. i loved the tandoori chicken! very nice. i promised to myself that il be back in singapore very soon and i will choose to stay at Holiday inn singapore orchard city centre. -Cindy galas Mosteiro Long live Hisocc

Reviews.Title: “value for money”
Reviews.Author: neshnair
Reviews.Content: The value for money, modern facility with less hassle and simplicity. The facility is even much more than other 5 stars hotel with higher price ,Executive Club Lounge was worth the money, Staff are so friendly & willing to help you with anything. The hotel location was very convenience closed to shopping center, a bunch of food courts around the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “it had graeat service but disappointed with room we booked”
Reviews.Author: carbodsbrizzy
Reviews.Content: We bood the club executive room. On the internet it seemed to have a seperate room with TV and lounge. When we arrived we had teh basic room with the benifits of the club lounge. However, i must rate the club lounge and staff A PLUS. As we travelled with out 2 dauthers and their boyfiends and we booked them only premium rooms. We we enq about an upgrade, it was not a problem and the cost was minamal. I would stay again if i had to go to Sinagopre as the breakfast and service was A 1 but be careful that you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Business Hotel in the Heart of Singapore”
Reviews.Author: worldcitygirl
Reviews.Content: I've been meaning to write this review for a few months because I had such a great stay at the Holiday Inn in Orchard City Centre in January. I stayed at the hotel for nearly 10 days while on business. Now I have to admit when my colleagues in our Singapore office recommended the Holiday Inn, I was skeptical. Holiday Inns in the US don't tend to be much to write home about, but was I ever wrong. This Holiday Inn is newly renovated and one look at the fabulous, sleek modern lobby and you know it will be a great stay. I arrived off a 22 hour plan ride just after mid-night and the front desk staff could not have been more friendly or efficient. I checked in and headed to my King Room. Sparkling clean. Fabulous. Beautiful modern decor with all of the amenities one would expect in a upscale business hotel. The bed linens were comfy and the mattress was a dream. Wonderful toiletries in the bathroom meant I didn't need to break out the supply I usually travel with (I'm a toiletry snob as you'll find if you read my other reviews.) The work out facility is more than adequate. While it's very small, there is everything you need to get a great workout. I love the towels, fruit and cold bottled water they provide. Nice touch. There is a lovely roof top pool that I am sorry I didn't get to use but it looked great. Breakfast is included in the price of the King room and I found it to be very good. Lots of good variety from Japanese breakfast selections, to traditional Chinese dishes such as congee along with standard American fare. The staff throughout the hotel are friendly and helpful. And I cannot say enough about the location. No trip to Singapore is complete without getting your shop on and the location of the hotel definitely accommodates this. In all a wonderful stay and I will most definitely recommend it to colleagues and friends visiting Singapore for business or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel in the shopping paradise”
Reviews.Author: aleeshabeevi
Reviews.Content: myself with my wife and daughter stayed here for four days. this is located close to the orchard street which is the best location for shopping in singapore. it is about five minutes walk from orchard station and we used MRT for commuting always. the hotel was very comfortable and the staff were pleasant and helping. The breakfast spread was not very good but it was okay. The rooms were large and comfortable. They also permit, at a nominal extra charge, three adults in a room, which is good for a family of three. we enjoyed our stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: fireball50
Reviews.Content: Everything about this place was wonderful. Staff and front desk provided excellent service. They will answer any questions and will assist you if you need any help (calling a cab, directions, places to eat, etc.) We had asked for connecting rooms which we received. Rooms were modern, clean and quiet. Beds were comfortable. Shower pressure was good. Hotel location provides easy access to just anywhere you want to go. There are eateries around everywhere within a 5 min walk. I will return back to this hotel when I visit Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Frequent Guest Recognition”
Reviews.Author: camsean
Reviews.Content: The Holiday Inn Orchard has a great location behind the Centrepoint shopping Centre, just off Orchard Road. As Platinum Priority Club members we were astounded to be offered complimentary dinner for two in the hotels' Indian restaurant, Tandoor. The front desk staff were even apologetic when they made this offer as they were unable to upgrade us. This generous offer shows a hotel that goes above and beyond to treat its guests well. In addition, the dinner was excellent and I would highly recommend the restaurant. The rooms themselves are a little on the small side but are equipped with the amenities one would expect of a hotel of this calibre. All in all, the HI Orchard is a great hotel in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Staff, Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: travel_loverSydney
Reviews.Content: This hotel has recently been renovated and therefore we were pleasantly surprised at how nice it was. We then went on to stay at the Rasa Shangrila Hotel Sentosa and were a little disappointed as it was not as nice. Location wise this is great you have a couple of MRT stops close by, good restaurants and of course good shopping all on your door step. Orchard Rd is a 2min walk. 1min walk away is a complex with outdoor/indoor restaurants, a 7eleven also round the corner - great place to buy a local sim card, we found this beneficial as my husband was working and I was exploring. With the MRT only a 5min walk away it means you can go and explore China town, Little India, Sentosa very easily. Would definitely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Great for families with young children!”
Reviews.Author: janesonia
Reviews.Content: The service by the staff was excellent especially the housekeeping, very helpful and accomodating. Room was slightly smaller than our expectation as we had three young children jumping and running around, so slightly on the cramp side in this aspect but facilities and amenities are sufficient. Location is great! Everything is within walking distance but during peak hours, best to travel by taxi(costly) then the MRT as its jammed packed like sardines and not a good idea when you're travelling with 3 young kids! What i like most of the hotel is the friendly staff and peaceful atmosphere the moment you enter the hotel, as compared to the outside environment of singapore's busy city life! What we least enjoyed was our bed was ont he lumpy side. Sleep could have been better.

Reviews.Title: “Should shopping be the agenda, then this hotel is ideally located”
Reviews.Author: Nawabofdelhi1
Reviews.Content: Singapore is a compact city state which is very easy to get around, with excellent infrastructure, having said that I would still vouch for the central location of this hotel. Located in a quiet street just off the busy & perhaps the hottest shopping districts of Asia Orchard road, this hotel offers an oasis of calm once you step inside after having perhaps spent the day indulging in shopping excess. Moreover even for first time visitors this is not a bad option for the hotel is just a 10 minute walk away from the Singapore visitor centre, that apart the the MRT station is a mere 5 minute walk away & access to public transportation is easy & fast. Stayed here for 4 nights towards the end of June to the first week of July. Check in was prompt & courteous. Got wifi connectivity vouchers complimentary plus a discount voucher for a meal at the Hotels restaurant which was a nice gesture. Stayed in a junior suite which was large & comfortable with all the fittings & amenities associated with the global Holiday Inn chain of hotels. A comfortable bed with a pillow menu, Large screen TV with an interesting choice of channels & fairly acceptable bathroom amenities. Had one meal at the Hotel's Indian restaurant called Tandoor & would highly recommend this to all. I will go as far as to say that the quality of food served here was better than quite a few of the restaurant’s of the same class & caliber back in India. The hotel swimming pool on the top floor was of a decent size & good functional gym was also on offer. Several restaurants & eateries dot the neighborhood so one can never go without a meal. On to the not so good parts, the room air conditioning was certainly below par & took a long time to cool the room to the extent we wanted. We got a non smoking room unfortunately and it seems that the previous occupants were heavy smoker’s for it took almost a day or so before the smell dissipated, again I attribute this to the weak air conditioning. Also felt the general lighting in the room could be improved, for with all the lights on also we felt at times that the room was dimly lit. Lastly the bathroom came with a bath tub, which I felt was a tad too high, making access a little tricky. In summary if the hotel was to sort out these minor glitches it is an excellent place to camp in for a few nights. If one can get a rate of around USD 125 per night for a standard room with out breakfast I would feel one has got an excellent deal.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Experience”
Reviews.Author: Gauravramchandani
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the business traveler. The executive suites were absolutely a treat to arrive into after a long and hard day’s work. Staff was very pleasant. The rooms were clean and well maintained each day. I would definetly recommend this to others. The location is just perfect, as the MTR station is just 5 mins away (by walk).

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: Getz
Reviews.Content: This is the first time I have stayed at the hotel and was impressed with the it. I stayed for a night using my Priority Rewards Points. Check in was at 2pm but I was given the room on the 8th floor at noon when I checked in. I was even given a complimentary drink voucher for the lounge. The room was tastefully decorated with flat inch TV. There was a variety of coffee, tea as well as green tea which came with the complimentary coffee maker in the room. There is even a turndown service with chocolate during the evening. I had lunch at the Indian restaurant on the lower ground floor. The food is good and the service is excellent. The location of the hotel is good as its within minutes from the MRT. The hotel is located at the back of the shopping mall, CentrePoint along Orchard Road. I took the MRT to the hotel from the airport which only cost S$3.00 (including the S$1.00 refund for the ticket). I will definitely stay there again during my next trip to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Everything just great”
Reviews.Author: Dae99
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for the past one week. Good location and nice room though it is a bit small compare with other 4 or 5 star hotel I stayed before. However it doesn't stop me from staying here regardless of the room size. The staff are friendly all the way when I stepped in till I check out. Would like to extend my sincere thanks to all the executive lounge staff especially lee kee,the assistant manager for the superb service and smiling! She is extremely helpful and seemed to know everything whenever I seek any help. Thanked her and the team which make my trip wonderful! Definitely,I will be back again..!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: fj787
Reviews.Content: Dont think we could have done better and right in the middle of the Orchard shopping district. Good rooms, great service and a hearty breakfast to start the day each morning. We'll be back I'm sure.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a stopover”
Reviews.Author: LeahSydney01
Reviews.Content: We (a family of 4, 2 adults, 2 children aged 7 and 11) spent one night here en route from Europe to Australia and had a good experience. The nice rooftop pool made for an enjoyable afternoon and everything ran very smoothly with check-in, check-out and room service. The hotel was fairly good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, good location, family friendly”
Reviews.Author: Berna68
Reviews.Content: this hotel is at the end of orchard road, and has really easy access to the main shopping and restaurants, all an easy 5 minute walk. the hotel is modern, clean and service was very good. pool area is fantastic, big pool lots of lounges in and out of the sun, nice spa plently of space. we travel to singapore every year and will be back at this hotel

Reviews.Title: “MY ONLY SINGAPORE ADDRESS”
Reviews.Author: gammo
Reviews.Content: Spent four nights at this hotel with my wife and two daughters and this was probably the twelveth time I have lived here. The hotel is centrally located , the rooms have been upgraded and re-furbished a year or so back to a very acceptable standard and as always, the service level of all the staff is exemplary. The lobby is spacious and bright, checkin is always a bit slow but very gracious and the rooms ( though only in the 28 to 30 square meter size-range) are excellently furnished. We had two rooms with two double beds each and every feature was above average... several pillow choices, decent mattresses, enough storage space and clean functional bathrooms with adequate toiletries and great towels. maybe the rooms are a tad underlit but its not a serious problem. The Tv too, was excellent with a wide range of programme options. The breakfast buffet is above average with lots of western and asian options, freshly squeezed juices and excellent varieties of teas and coffee. The room service menu is quite extensive and the food is of a high standard...though a bit pricey! The restaurant (Window on the park) also serves better than average fare at rates marginally lower than room-service. All the serving staff, cleaning staff, reception employees and the hostesses at the Executive Club Lounge are incredibly polite and helpful and the concierge and entrance lobby staff, too, are excellent. I unhesitatingly suggest this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Be wary of glowing reviews......”
Reviews.Author: clanciegirl
Reviews.Content: Every now and then you come across a string of TA reviews that just don't seem to match reality; this is one of those instances. First up there is nothing overly wrong with this hotel; it's in a good location, the rooms are reasonably well appointed and it has an okay roof top pool area. But there's nothing overly right with the place either. We arrived just after midnight to find an under-staffed check in desk with the whole environment made worse by two local Singapore vocalists belting out Barry Manilow in the bar next door. After a bumbling inefficient staff member checked us in, we were off to our room. And that pretty much set the tone of our stay - front desk is very average and so is housekeeping (the worst I have experienced in Singapore). We had Exec Lounge access; this is quite nice - but no better than any other similar facility in Sing. Some staff were attentive and some really couldn't be bothered. Nothing to wax lyrical about. Bottom line is that this is a reasonable hotel property. It is a Holiday Inn and a 4 star property and as long as you can manage a reasonable rate and keep your expectations in line, you'll be okay. It is one of the few hotel properties in Sing that genuinely offers a good sized room with 2 double beds - so particularly good for families, but I think couples can do better elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: jtnru
Reviews.Content: We (2 adults and 2 children ) stayed for four nights in a twin premier room ( 2 double beds) ,the room was a reasonable size for us all neat and tidy , with a LCD tv and a nice bathroom. A couple of things i didnt like were the pay 50c per minute for the Internet, no tour desk ( the concierge organized our tours through the hotel next door) . The things I did like were - breakfast was a good array of foods - lots of fruit and hot food choices and good service. The pool area whilst didn't offer a view was good with a decent size pool . We ate in the Indian restaurant one night and whilst a liitle pricey for the food was very nice. The location was the best thing about this hotel especially if you come for the shopping. It's a minute away from orchard rd ( and with all the sales on was a little dangerous!) and there are also some nice reasonably priced eateries around the corner . I would stay here again just for the location especially if I came for the shopping ( and after exploring some of the other shopping centers I do think orchard road offered the best choices!) . Please note it's not a five star hotel at all more like a 31/2 rating, still more than comfortable particularly if you are looking for a room for a family of four.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Krisna-M
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel, clean, best location, recommended. We'll back again !!....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Renovated Rooms are Great”
Reviews.Author: colio
Reviews.Content: Visited this hotel for a business trip in Singapore. Stayed 3 nights in a King Deluxe Room. This is the old Parkview hotel & there are parts of the hotel like the lobby & corridors leading up to the room that could still do with some major updating, but the rooms themselves were awesome. They have been completely renovated by Holiday Inn & were stylish & comfortable. Large LCD TV coupled with an iPod docking station for alarm clock added a great modern feel. Bed was very comfortable & room spacious enough. Everything was very clean & staff were friendly. When we stayed there unfortunately the hotel was fully booked so despite being a long term Platinum rewards member, I didn't get upgraded, however the hotel staff were obliging & offered me other benefits including free internet & 50% off at the restaurant for myself & my colleagues who traveled with me. We didn't eat at the restaurant as the hotel is right around the corner from Orchard Rd so we visited the local Kopitiams at the shopping centres for a tasty authentic breakfast each morning that cost less than $A4 each! Overall a very good experience for a Holiday Inn. A bit on the pricey side but in-line with other Singapore hotels. A tip, if you decide to have a business meeting in the cafe below, expect to pay exorbitant rates for coffees & juices!! There's a Starbucks close by that will be less than half the price you pay for at this cafe.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and will be back”
Reviews.Author: Collins53
Reviews.Content: A decent hotel and staff are friendly and the room is clean , My sister and a friend with me stay in a two double bed room and I can't complain about the hotel .It near Orchard Rd and a MRT station which was easy for us to travel by bus or MRT. Even though it was a bit costly but I think it was worth it I book the Hotel through Expedia and every thing went smoothly as I was a bit afraid that the thing will fall through as I book it oversea and it make my holiday great for the final trip before I come home We got there on the end of May in time for Singapore Great Sale. There was a lot of people everywhere Had a great time go to those sale

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 4 star”
Reviews.Author: Bali4eva
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights in a club room at Holiday Inn and it was far better than I expected. I know Holiday Inn have made a lot of improvements with a lot of their properties, and this is obviously one of those. All staff we encountered were polite and very friendly and professional. Our room was large, but only had a view of the road which wasn't ideal, but hardly an issue. The service in the club lounge was efficient and professional, and amenities quite good. I honestly have enjoyed better food and beverage at other hotels, but they were 5 star, so shouldn't really compare. All in all a great hotel and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: tchan_11
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre. I always opt to stay in this hotel when I visit Singapore because I am certain that my stay will be a very pleasant one. The service is impeccable; staff offer personalised assistance and are very helpful and friendly. Rooms are conducive and spacious and the beds are extremely comfortable!

Reviews.Title: “Nice , comfortable, convenient, we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: mannubhai
Reviews.Content: We chose Holiday Inn based on Tripadvisor reviews especially since this was a trip with the family (wife and 2 kids). Also the location seemed ideal , close as it was to Orchard Road. Airport to Hotel was around S$ 28 or so. Since we were two families we opted for a larger minivan from a Limouzine service which cost us around S$ 75 one way (return was S$ 65) but this took all 8 of us and our 7 large bags. We opted for the Executive Club Rooms and check in was smooth , the staff was smiling. We had opted for the rooms with twin beds and this ensured that we didn't need an extra bed in the room. Room service was good and the food was also fairly good. There was an excellent Food Court right next to the Hotel (Cuppage Court) which was inexpensive and served all types of food..from Indian to Chinese to Mediterranean. At the Hotel , Breakfast was included and the child eats free policy ensured that we didn't have to pay extra for the kids. The terrace pool was fairly large and the gym was adequate . The Executive lounge was also fairly nice and they had happy hours from 5.30 pm to 7.30 pm. While the staff were good especially Nadeeka and Komal , we felt that the lounge could have been replenished more often. Free internet access was available in the lounge for all executive club room guests.They also had no restrictions on the kids using the Lounge (as long as the parents were with them). The concierge was efficient and infomative especially Morgan and one smiling young lady (Nadzira) used to make walking into the Hotel a pleasure as she always had a nice word for everyone. As for hygiene and housekeeping it was quite good and efficient and would be available whenever we called for them , promptly. Rooms were a mite expensive for the size and amenities provided but the location, staff and convenience kind of balanced it out . We'll be back on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: shell067
Reviews.Content: Loved it here - the best location, amazing service, awesome food, beautiful rooms. Definetly recommend it

Reviews.Title: “Best Holiday Inn there is”
Reviews.Author: dkt55
Reviews.Content: Stay here on business regularly, also took family for a few days break, always great service, staff retention very good as the same people look after you every time. Some of the best beds in Singapore and rooms always immaculate. Go for the executive lounge and let Sheena and the rest of the staff look after you. Great band for entertainment in the lobby in the evening, very convient for all the major shopping areas. I use the Holiday Inn group a lot and this one is the best I've come across.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: andytudor46
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights We checked in after at 12hr flight and the staff were really friendly and helpfull, we got to our room and the room was great 2 big comfy beds with a big screen TV, mini bar, iron and ironing board and a free safe which was great. The bathroom was nice and modern with toiletries there everyday and fresh towels. The Internet isn't free either but luckily been a platinum member we got a choice of things we could win for our whole stay and was lucky to get free Internet acsess, we also got free welcome drink passes which was great and we used :-) We also went to the pool and gym both clean and the gym has modern equipment but the the gym is a bit small. The hotel is in a fantastic location couldn't of asked for better 2mins from all the shops, resturantes close by, tube stop close by to get around to different places, couldnt fault the location. To sum up the hotel it's a great hotel to stay in for location and for nice rooms but it didn't wow me but I guess from holiday inns you don't get that but I would defo stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday Inn --Best Ever”
Reviews.Author: BarryJ_100
Reviews.Content: We stay at a lot of Holiday Inns, this one is out of the box, Obviously recently renovated, its modern, spotless and great staff.The breakfast restaurant is very good, with great choice and an egg chef. 100 meters to Orchard road shopping and 150 meters to the MRT, room had flat screen TV, a great bathroom and lots of space.

Reviews.Title: “Long Term Stay”
Reviews.Author: SevenStarBuddy
Reviews.Content: From the moment I arrived I was treated with kindness and a smile. It was 6:00 a.m. after a flight from LAX through Shanghai and then on to Singapore so you can imagine I was tired and not thinking too clearly. I missed my ride at the airport and needed to call them. The gentleman at the Front Desk offered his cellular phone for me to use and I made my call. That was my first experience of what I have come to receive as "Above and beyond the call of duty". I have the use of the Executive Lounge due to my Long Term Stay and everyone there is extremely kind. I can't tell you how much it means to someone so far away who will be staying at the hotel for so long (MORE THAN 3 MONTHS). I wish I could remember all their names and those that I do remember, I can't remember how to spell. Nauteeka (I'm sure I spell her name wrong) and the others are always there to make sure that all my needs are taken care of. All I have to do is ask and it happens. I wish I could take them all home with me to Los Angeles because Americans need to experience this kind of pampering at least once in their lives.

Reviews.Title: “Superb”
Reviews.Author: sandy1968_11
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, efficient and courteous service, well designed functional rooms, good buffet breakfast. Lot of options of local sightseeing packages at reasonable cost. We have no reason for any complaint.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for business”
Reviews.Author: iophir
Reviews.Content: On several days stay in Singapore, this was a great choice. The hotel is located not far from the highway and the drive from the airport is about 30 minutes. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful with all our needs. Rooms are clean and tidy, great bed to rest in after long flight or business meeting. We had only breakfast in the hotel but it was good and the place was clean with many people on duty to serve. Overall we enjoyed our stay and definitely come back.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it”
Reviews.Author: monoz
Reviews.Content: Upgraded to a Deluxe Suite, with free rollaway's for the kids, excellent new rooms, plenty of space. Bed was excellent, good curtains cut out the light. Staff more than helpful. Kids loved the pool. Short stroll to Orchard Rd to explore the shops. Great stay, and above average Holiday Inn for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Convinent location for both eating&shopping.”
Reviews.Author: Busarin1
Reviews.Content: Good location,near major mrt station.clean room &great breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievably Good!”
Reviews.Author: gmb27
Reviews.Content: After a recent 5 night stay in Singapore I cannot speak highly enough of this hotel. We have travelled and stayed extensively around the world and this modestly priced hotel offers the most magical ambience, location, service and quality that we have experienced for some time. Do you yourself a favour and book an 'Executive' room as the 'value adds' are well worth the added expense. If this is the standard of Holiday Inn around the world then they have a secret not many know about!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: SopY_16
Reviews.Content: Upon checked in was greeted with warm and friendly welcome from the staff and given a bottle of water when waiting for key.Overall it was a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and conveniently loacted.”
Reviews.Author: SonaG
Reviews.Content: I was with a large group during my 3 night stay at this hotel in Jan 2011. It is a short walk from the MRT station and a very convenient base to explore Orchard Road from. The lobby is plush and the staff at the reception helpful. There is a lovely bar with live music every evening. The room I stayed in was spacious and very comfortable...with large beds, tv, minibar, kettle, chairs, ironing board...big clean bathroom with a lovely bathtub. Overall, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and would strongly recommend the place to others.

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Destination in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Badari
Reviews.Content: We recently booked and Stayed at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre (last week only) and enjoyed its good and clean room and freindly behaviour of the staff. This is not the first time we are visitng Singapore but certainly first time we took this hotel and we are not at all disappointed for its value for the money coupled with advantage of its location. It is indeed a Perfect Destination for both "People holidaying" & or for "Business trip"

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Location & Service”
Reviews.Author: andc24
Reviews.Content: My mother & I have just stayed at this wonderful hotel for the last 7 days & all I can say was it was FANTASTIC the staff could not do enough for you. The LOCATION was within walking distance to everything. My mother has M.S and nothing was too much trouble the staff where so attentive to all our needs it was great. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “different days - different impressions”
Reviews.Author: comnen
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel twice, rooms were the same, but the manager at the desk can change everything. It depends whom you meet if you will be treated respectfully or not. The first time manager did not "mention" the status in IHG program I have, did not offer anything. another time I was offered a gift from the hotel (on a random choice) and welcome drink. Totally I like the hotel and the brand as a whole, but what can I say, folks? The quality of the rooms should be accompanied with quality of service!

Reviews.Title: “almost everything was ok, except for wifi!”
Reviews.Author: Goscha
Reviews.Content: Room was ok: big, comfortable and clean. Hotel had sauna, fitness room, swim pool and jacuzzi at the top of the hotel. We used only swim pool with sun lounger. It was not bad. In the evenings at the bar was live music and songs. In my opinion this hotel should have free Wi-Fi in lobby (how other hotels in this branch do). Good place to stay in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Value for Money and GREAT service!”
Reviews.Author: Barryza
Reviews.Content: My first time in Singapore and I could not have possibly chosen a better place to stay! The staff are fantastically friendly the Hotel is very clean and modern and also extremely well situated. From getting out of the taxi and being helped by the friendly concierge and the door man to being assisted by the efficient front desk staff, everything was great! The executive lounge is a MUST! If you are going to get the best out of your stay in Singapore with Mia and her great team your need is promptly attended to. The rooms were nice and modern with more than enough space and comfort. When I go back to Singapore and I will the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre is the only place I will stay at!

Reviews.Title: “tender service”
Reviews.Author: michelle294265
Reviews.Content: i would like to thank all executive lounge staff for making my trip successful.its just a wonderful time with u guys.you all are best.everthng is perfect in this hotel.this is the proper place to be stay.i impressed with the service harry always remember my drinks whnever i come he serve me my fav drink.he is a superstar,thank u all and i recommend everybdy to stay in holiday inn

Reviews.Title: “Nice enough - but service is based on quantity not quality”
Reviews.Author: MrL_10
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel a number of times and while the location is very good and the rooms are comfortable, the service falls well short. There appears to be staff everywhere, but I would rather see less of them in exchange for a few staff capable of delivering quality service. The executive club staff are a case in point, where staff are almost overbearing in numbers, but few really look closely to determine what guests require. The staff are all very friendly (sometimes too friendly) but not very observant. As an example, 4 staff standing next to empty food/drink containers shows a lack of training and proper management oversight. Sleep was very difficult because of the volume of the "Muzak" playing in the corridors. It made the overall experience very unpleasant. As a premium member of the chain's loyalty program, I was very dissapointed with the service from check-in to check out. I will probably not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good location close to Orchard street”
Reviews.Author: gdbhinge
Reviews.Content: Good hotels in Singapore are mostly expensive compared to KL. In those hotels Holiday Inn close to Orchard street stands out. It has good location close to Somerset MRT station. All the main attractions could be accessed thru MRT. Room and bathroom are clean but not specious. Breakfast is good but the restaurant is too small to accommodate all guests. Overall it is a good experience but at extra cost.

Reviews.Title: “Service”
Reviews.Author: 195110jim
Reviews.Content: Great time and fantastic employee's. I want to say thanks especially to the Executive Lounge staff, Cyra, Danielle, Paula, Mia, Lee Kee, Ivy and Harry. Every evening there was like being with close friends. They need to be commended. Thanks for their kindness. Good job Holiday inn!..............Jim

Reviews.Title: “Made an excellent choice (with the aid of Trip Advisor)”
Reviews.Author: interested_11
Reviews.Content: My sister, my husband and myself stayed in an Executive Room , and with all the extra inclusions, breakfast, afternoon tea, cocktails etc we were made to feel very welcome. and comfortable. We requested, and were given, a quiet room, which was located at the end of the hotel, on the 6th floor, but that did involve quite a walk to the lifts. Only minor 'grouses' Room an the small side for three people. The ice machine not centrally located However, all the staff were really friendly, and the location is ideal for a short stay. Overall excellent value for money.

Reviews.Title: “rooms nice, beware of internet”
Reviews.Author: TravelingMan999
Reviews.Content: Rooms are small but nice and very clean. Location is good. Just be aware of internet charges which are $29 a day, plus taxes. When I checked out, they tried to charge me for more days than I used.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great quality hotel with excellent value”
Reviews.Author: JGS2811
Reviews.Content: This hotel has an excellent location, just off Orchard Road, close to the MRT and just across the road from a Cuppage Terrace - a row of restaurants. Very clean and comfortable with very friendly and helpful staff. We booked in advance and got a very good rate. Paying in advance for breakfast (the children's breakfasts were free) also saved us money. We would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good value, good quality hotel in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Holiday Inn Excellence in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Capt_Camper
Reviews.Content: We have just completed an extensive holiday in SE Asia, Staying in some wonderful Resorts and Hotels. I was most impressed with our final stay in what can only be described as a surprising, enjoyable and quality hotel, the Holliday Inn, Orchard. We had stayed in the Crowne Plaza in KL and the Plaza Metropolis in Kong Kong. We stayed in the Executive Rooms to enjoy the privilages of the Executive Lounges in each of the hotels. Considering the Crowne PLaza is meant to be a more up market hotel I cant give enough praise to the Holiday Inn in Singapore for its amazing standard of hospitality, service and quality of product. Not to demean the other properties but I'm sure if the GM's of the other two properties were to visit the Holiday Inn they would understand what I am saying. Special praise should be given to the Ladies and Gents who work in the Executive Lounge. I have never in all the hotels I have stayed in for both business and leasure over the last 10 years, have ever witnessed such politness, devotion to the customer and genuine helpfulness. I am a Gold Priority Club member and this standard of service will always entice me to come back for more. Thankyou Holiday Inn, Singapore, I will definatly return.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: FlorenceOfArabia8
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel, can't believe this is only rated a 4 star, it was better than the other two 5 star hotels that we stayed in on the same trip. Lobby is very impressive, rooms were a good size and standard, modern luxurious bathrooms, breakfast buffet was fantastic - too much choice! We liked the children's play area in the restaurant. Great location, close to the shops, restaurants and bars. (Tip: there's a laundry to the rear of the hotel in Cuppage Plaza, they did all our laundry in 3 hrs for £6) Only one 'negative'....on the night we arrived they didn't have any interconnecting rooms (which we had booked in advance). However, the next day they found us interconnecting rooms and moved all our luggage while we were out sightseeing.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect choice for location and room size”
Reviews.Author: forestfamilySydney
Reviews.Content: We travelled with 2 kids (9 & 11yrs) and I struggled to find hotels in Asia that offered affordable family rooms and a decent pool. This Holiday Inn was an excellent choice. The rooms were certainly big enough. The location was perfect - 1 block from Orchard Rd and close by the freeway ramp. Heaps of great restaurants within 5 min walk and even a cheap laundry service just across the road in Cuppage Plaza. One lesson learned though - Singapore doesnt do breakfast like other places do . Not much other than Starbucks and Coffee Club opens before 10 am .The holiday Inn buffet breakfast was excellent but expensive I think about $25-30 Singapore per person and even though it's nice to have tables and tables of choice - what kid eats $30 worth of breakfast? Room service for breakfast was actually cheaper for us, but such a shame not to be out and about. If you don't want to spend the big $ for Holiday Inn breaky, head down Killiney Rd. There are a few little coffee houses that do breakfasts including Freshly Baked at 57 Killiney Road. Cinnamon bread, toasts,macaroons, crusty breads ( cant remember if they do eggs) and good coffee. The famous Kopi Killiney is a couple of doors up.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and clean”
Reviews.Author: psgcarca
Reviews.Content: Very central location. Large swimming pool and practical when you are travelling with two children because the hotel provides double/double rooms for 4. Very nice buffet breakfast with many international options.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Chambers63
Reviews.Content: We have always stayed at Orchard Road Holiday Inn when in Singapore. Over the last 4 years we have upgraded our room to the Executive Floor which works out to be such good value. Not only is breakfast included but all day drinks, afternoon tea, evening snacks & a cocktail hour from 6.00pm to 8.00pm. Having said all that the one thing that makes the Executive lounge so perfect is the staff - Percy & his team are absolutely fantastic! The hotel is in a superb location. Plus our sons absolutely adore roof top pool.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Dez2428
Reviews.Content: Everytime Im in Singapore i stay at the holiday inn!! It's in a fantasic position close to mrt station 5 min away, bus stops for tours, heaps of shopping center, to he visitor centre where you book anything and everything and more!! I have stayed in a standard room, club and executive room by far an executive room is they way to go for short stopovers of 2-3 days but any longer can get expensive!! I recommend the breakfast option as it has a great variety!! Staff are lovely as always and very helpful!! Rooms are comfortable and new!! By far the cheapest hotel in the area and defiantly worth every penny!!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing value and impeccable presentation.”
Reviews.Author: kjm7077
Reviews.Content: Stayed four nights. Was considerably cheaper than surrounding similar rated hotels. Now this may seem a little strange but I often judge a hotel by the appliances offered in the room. The iron and hair dryer were modern and not el cheapo models (unlike many other hotels I,ve stayed in) flat tv was large and offered a good range of channels. iPhone clock radio. DVD. Staff were very friendly and prompt with any queries or requests. Decor was modern and appealing. Lobby was very pleasing on the eye. Check in was very speedy. Great range of food for breakfast and children were very well catered for, even a childrens section for their own food selection. Will not stay in another hotel in Singapore but this one. Have stayed at the Concorde, orchard parade hotel and park royal and this hotel far exceeded those in all areas.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific hotel for family w young children”
Reviews.Author: Alexounette
Reviews.Content: I must recommend this hotel for the fantastic service staff offered to our family with a 2yo child. Our room was ready before check in time and the portacot was there already setup, with baby sized doona and baby product pack including baby shampoo, soap, massage oil, powder... The staff at the buffet breakfast was amazing, looking after our young one and playing with her while we could enjoy our brekkie (which is very generous for both adult and children). I loved the fact they provided children plastic plates and cultleries, cereals and small cupcakes. Toys were appropriate, clean and even new ones brought in! Hotel lended us a stroller for free, which made our life a lot easier. Swimming pool had inflatable balls and flotties for kids to play, a definite winner ! Location was perfect. We will surely come back to this hotel. The lobby may look a bit tacky but the rooms have been refurbished and are modern and quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded Expectations for Family Of Four”
Reviews.Author: FOSTERSAdelaide
Reviews.Content: We have been to Singapore several times, but only as a couple, so on this trip we struggled find a hotel in SIngapore where we could have 2 children in a room with us. 99% of hotels will permit 1 child in a rollaway bed and if you have a 2nd child, they will have to share your bed. Well our kids are 10 and 12 so that was out of the question! It seemed we either had to fork out a fortune for a 2 bedroom suite or a second room. At one stage we actually considered the YMCA Family Room, due to how prohibitive the cost of a hotel was going to be! Thankfully I found the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre on Qantas Holidays. We booked a 2 x Double Room, which has 2 double beds, for a reasonable price. As this hotel only has a 4 star rating I expected less than what we got. Less service, less wow factor. Upon entering the lobby our kids gasped. It was beautiful. Our room was also lovely. Apparently it has been refurbished recently and we were suitably impressed. I can't comment on the breakfast or the pool area as we didn't utilise either. This is a great value for money option for a family travelling together and brings a touch of "very nice" to what we had thought would be much less than it turned out to be. Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Nicest hotel I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: cavecere
Reviews.Content: Being a US citizen living in Australia for the past 6 months and traveling quite a bit, I would have to say this is the nicest hotel I have ever stayed in. I stayed in an Executive room, I think it is the same price as other rooms. In my executive room, I recieved free internet, 2 items to washed and dried and access to the executive lounge with free drinks and snacks. Everyone at the hotel were very friendly. The are a lot of workers keeping it clean. The room is very quite, firm or soft pillows to choose from. Location is near the Somerset MRT station (subway) which is a 5 minute walk to Holiday Inn, it is easy to get from the airport to the hotel using the subway, really inexpensive ~$3/person. The Hotel is just off Orchard Road, lots of malls to go shopping and it is easy to take the subway to any part of Singapore. The zoo is about 1 hour away by train and bus. If I return to Singapore, I will stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great location in central Singapore.”
Reviews.Author: CymroDyserth
Reviews.Content: The Holiday Inn Orchard City has a great location, just off Orchard Road. We stayed in a Premier Room, which included breakfast. The room was large with a good sized bathroom and comfortable Queen sized bed. Breakfast offered a range of dishes, both European and Asian, with omlettes individually cooked. The only negative was the very high cost of internet, far higher than any other hotel on our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Cant ask for better in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: DrVikas
Reviews.Content: Moved into this hotel after some issues with my last hotel that I checked in during my last visit to Singapore for business. I cant ask for a better location than this Hotel - Right off the world famous orchard street and yet quiet for a great sleep in the night. The property comes very unassumingly in the CBD of Singapore with wonderful no fussy rooms for the discerning business traveler. Just behind the property there is a food court serving Indian, Italian & Other Cuisine. The Hotel also has some very nice restaurants but personally I did not much like its breakfast spread. The service is prompt and facilities in and around the property provide much for a long business stay in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Not as Good as Expected”
Reviews.Author: GraceYang
Reviews.Content: I had high expectations after reading from Tripadvisor about this hotel. However, the actual stay failed my expectations quite a bit. Though the photos on Tripadvisor look all kinda fancy, the hotel is actually quite dated. It just has a depressing feeling which didn't make me feel happy. I am a Platinum member of the Priority Club, but I didn't get any recognition. No free internet, no free breakfast. Not sure if my room got upgraded or not either. I asked for a non-smoking room but got a smoking junior suite, which wasn't really a suite, but more like a bigger version of a normal room. The room size is decent. Room is quiet. Everything is clean. Breakfast buffet was okay. Staff at the restaurant were friendly. I switched to the Traders the next two nights and got a room almost the same price. The Traders has smaller rooms and location not as great as this Holiday Inn, but the overall experience was much better.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in Good Location”
Reviews.Author: orac53
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel right next to Orchard Rd. It is what you would expect from Holiday Inn. My only issue is for the business traveler the internet charges are a ripp-off. I use the internet quiet a bit as I need to keep my business running when traveling. At almost $30 per day or just a hour per day is just not on when many good hotels provide it free. As a result I did not use Holiday Inn for the next 2 destinations on this trip which I had intended to do.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel but expensive”
Reviews.Author: xavier16
Reviews.Content: This is one of the very few hotels in Singapore that allows four people in a room. We paid rouglhy around US$360 dollars per night, which is really steep, but then again Singapore is expensive especially in hotels in Orchard Road, which was the area we wanted to stay in. Okay back to the hotel- it's a very lovely hotel in Orchard Road. It's not really in Orchard Road, more like a block from Orchard Road, whcih is very very near. If you want to be near the shopping malls, this is the place! The lobby was excellent and the staff were friendly and helpful. They gave us free drinks coupons because we were Priority Club members and allowed us late check-out without charge. The rooms were big and modern, the beds were very comfy, bathrooms were beautiful and clean. They even had a weighing scale in the bathroom, good for watching if you've eaten too much. :-) I didn't hear noise from our neighbors so I presume walls were thick enough. Rooms were cleaned everyday. No free internet though, breakfast is for a fee, business center internet is charged by the minute and very expensive. But then this all comes in territory for 4-5 stars hotel where they nickel and dime you for everything. Really nothing to complain about this hotel as it is really a good hotel. Would maybe stay again if finances permit. But there are defintely other cheaper options in Singapore as well (and there are definitely more expensive ones). If the price for this hotel seems right for you, don't even hesitate because you will get good rooms, great service, and a wondeful location.

Reviews.Title: “Good location,”
Reviews.Author: Z-CGageler
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night and spent two days in the Orchard road area. We liked this hotel well enough, the decor seemed a bit tired to us and staff were good but nothing to write home about. We also stayed at the Pan Pacific in Marina Bay and liked it much better, although the orchard road location is a big plus for this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Truly magnificent”
Reviews.Author: K0500
Reviews.Content: This hotel rates as more than 5 star. Booked over the internet via the Holiday Inn website we got everything we were promised and much more. We arrived late at night and check-in went quickly and smoothly. Breakfast was outstanding, absolutely nothing that a person could possibly want for and the service was 6 star. Staff remembered us each day greeted us warmly and anticipated our needs really well. The variety of the buffet was excellent, good tea and coffee, catering well for young children too with mini muffins, doughnuts and special cutlery and toys too. The decor in the hotel was stunning - decorated for Chinese New Year but even so the lobby and facilities were beautiful. The swimming pool area is great with plenty of lounges and towels. The gym, although small is well equipped and has TV's to watch while you work out! Concierge was top class always welcoming, opening doors and hailing taxis, no request was too much. Housekeeping also deserves a mention - our room was clean every morning (we stayed 5 nights) before we got back from breakfast and they had seen there was more than 2 people in the room and gave plenty of water and extra toiletries and towels. the pillows were awesome too - a selection to suit anyone. Centrally located on Orchard Road it cost only a few dollars to anywhere in a taxi and you could walk to the shops, hawker centres and malls in seconds. I wouldn't just recommend this hotel I would say if you go to Singapore stay there! Great value for money and you can see how Singaporeans do service, which is second to none.

Reviews.Title: “Inconsistent and No Platinum Recognition”
Reviews.Author: DiggerDeals
Reviews.Content: The quality of this stay was hampered by a lukewarm welcome and inconsistent service. Goods: Floor, lounge and pool staff were very friendly. The pool. Not So Goods: No Platinum recognition - "as a Priority Club member you receive two free drinks" Stange lottery at desk - choose another reward - "Congatulations! A free drink" No upgrade - "Subject to availablity" - The higher floors looked empty to me! Bizarre letter from guest relations regarding use of Club Lounge by visitors - we haven't had visitors in any of our previous stays and would not presume to entertain in the Club Lounge. This facility was showing a lot of improvement post renovation. I am sorry to see that what was my favourite hotel in Singapore for value for money has slipped. The location is still great but the management attitude to higher level Priority Club members is disappointing.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and fantastic service”
Reviews.Author: ness_st
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at this hotel and we probably enjoyed it even more this time. The rooms are very clean and comfortable - quite spacious as well. We always book a club room when we stay and the club lounge is fantastic, a great range of food and nice wines. Breakfast is also great, we had breakfast in the main restaurant and the range is extensive. The service is what really makes this property great though. We travelled with our toddler-aged daughter and the staff were so attentive, always coming up and talking with her and anticipating our needs by bringing her a high chair, some warm milk and the bread sticks which she took a liking to! We would definitely say that they exceeded our expectations in every way and also that the hotel exceeds it's 4 star rating. It's certainly better than many 5 star hotels we've stayed at! There were only two down sides - the club lounge started to get extremely busy and so it took a little of the enjoyment out of the environment and the fitness centre - extremely small and hot inside and with no one attending the area, kids kept running in and out for a look around, which got a little annoying. Other than that, a fantastic stay, we wouldn't stay anywhere else in Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “Really rather good!!”
Reviews.Author: SuperTrev
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on its location, and to be honest its price compared to the other branded hotels along Orchard Road. I was pleasantly surprised, especially by the level of customer service I received throughout my 6 night stay. Overall it exceeded my expectations and I would be happy to recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, but not the best location in orchard road.”
Reviews.Author: KizoLove
Reviews.Content: Like what the title suggests, this hotel is definitely value for money. the rooms are modern, clean and comfortable, but are on the smaller side. the location, however, is not the greatest for shopping as its in the end of orchard road kinda far from the big name shopping malls. in terms of location, you're better off at the mandarin meritus -- that is, if you're there to shop til you drop. there are lots of food stalls around the area, if that's what you're after.

Reviews.Title: “Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Countrygirlplus3
Reviews.Content: Our family of 2 adults and 2 children (aged 10 & 13) have just returned. This hotel only has 8 floors but is very long. We requested a non-smoking room and a room on the highest floor but they could only give us the 5th floor and NON smoking. I found there was still some street noise which was a concern as I like absolute quiet but I slept very well. The beds were a little hard but otherwise good. The room was well appointed and looked exactly like their on-line pictures. There was an iron, ironing board, large tv, dvd player, kettle etc, in-room safe, clothes line over the bath, hairdryer and mini-bar. Beware of mini bar prices. Internet was $30 Singapore dollars per 24hours AND per connection so be careful. They supplied the normal shampoos etc and tea and coffee but no milk. The room temperature was easy to control. The like to have $50 a day deposit to cover expenses. Don't expect WiFi at McDonalds etc as you need to register first and to do that you have to use a local number but just go to the Tourist Information Office on Orchard Road and you can use it for 15 mins. Room service was slow and the food cold and poor value for money. I ordered the Club Sandwich and it was very small and not worth the money. Their buffet breakfasts were good with good variety and they even a special area for young children with toys and special breakfast food. We used the MRT (Mass Rapid Transit) trains to get around - very cheap and fast. It took us to most places we needed to get to. The taxis are also cheap but there is a peak hour surcharge which can double the price. It is all metered and the drivers are good.
