We took a taxi from Holiday Inn out to Singapore Zoo at 10:15am and it cost us $16.60 Singapore dollars. The MRT can get you out to the Singapore Flyer and to Chinatown and even out to Changi Airport. There are many different lines but it was easy to cross over. The pool area is delightful, there is also a sauna and gym area. The staff spoke perfect English and were very polite, helpful and welcoming. The hotel is well located and only a few mins walk to Orchard Road. We would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Compassion & Humanity”
Reviews.Author: kblPune
Reviews.Content: I had booked a double room for 2 days at Holiday Inn Orchard City Center, Singapore. But 1 day before arrival in Singapore I got a sad news of demise in my family and we had to return back to India. I cancelled my booking with Holiday Inn and received a confirmation immediately. Though the Hotel standard procedure does not allow any refund on cancellation on my request the Hotel agreed to refund the full amount of advance paid, and I got the refund within 15 days of my cancellation. I am really obliged and humbled by the compassion and Humanity shown by the hotel staff and have become a permanent fan of this Group of Hotels.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful stay at the Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: melk00
Reviews.Content: Our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 children) really enjoyed the wonderful hospitality displayed by the staff at the Holiday Inn. We arrived hours before check in and thought we would ask if our luggage could be stored while we walked to the very near Orchard Road shopping precinct, however we were pleasantly surprised when we were informed that we could check in. The room was lovely, modern and reasonably spacious for 4, and the bathroom was fresh and spotlessly clean with a generous size bath. Breakfast (included daily) was exceptional with a wide variety of choices to cater for everyone. The restaurant staff were attentive and checked often to see if everything was to our satisfaction. As the hotel was fully booked (the start of the Chinese New Year) the hotel staff apologised that they could not offer a later check out than 12 noon. However as our flight home was not until later that evening, we were allowed to store our luggage at the hotel for the day and use the hotel facilities as we pleased. A perfect location- close to restaurants, food halls, shopping, bars and public transport, we strongly recommend this hotel as being great value for money and child friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeding 4 star standards”
Reviews.Author: kd2011
Reviews.Content: We checked in to this refurbished hotel, never expecting that we would enjoy the hotel & its services. The hotel is located at the prime location, Orchard & has an easy access to almost every options that are needed to be explored while you are in Singapore. The staff was very couteaus & friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great for business (for dad) and leisure (mum and kids)”
Reviews.Author: Holidayhumphs
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Holiday Inn for our second time. We took a room on the Executive Club floor both times which I highly recommend. While my husband was able to use the Executive Club area after hours for making work calls and emailing, the children and I were able to use it for drinks, cups of tea...and just having extra space! The location is great as there are resturants galore nearby and I was able to run out and do shopping. The hotel staff definitely are this hotel's best feature...they really took care of us each time...from the doormen, to the waiting staff and particulalry the team in the Executive Club. My 10 year old daughter felt very comfortable with the staff in there...and was happy having lots of hot chocolates made for her! It was hard to drag her away! Good value room service...great maintenance staff...we could go on and on! But let me tell you the beds and pillows were amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: csw0101
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights 23-25 Dec. This Holiday Inn is a step up on the Holiday Inns in Australia that I've stayed in. Rooms were very nice and spacious. The check in staff were very friendly and helpful as well. Great location - only minutes away from Somerset station although walking with large suitcases in the busy evening period can be a bit difficult with the multitudes of people shopping! We didnt' have time to try out the pool or gym unfortunately. We didn't eat breakfast at the hotel as we preferred to try the local cuisine nearby (yum!)

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, staff and rooms”
Reviews.Author: HatMelbourne
Reviews.Content: Recently renovated we had a great two night stay. The rooms are modern and well designed with plenty or storage space, turn down service, complementary fruit and pillow menu. The pool is on the roof which is a good size with plenty of lounges and a covered area for when it rains. Breakfast was great - with a wide selection catering for all tastes. On the down side the internet rates are very expensive. There is a cafe at the back that offers free wi fi so it is cheaper to buy a drink there then to pay $35S per day in the hotel. The rooms are on the expensive side but well worth the cost if you are are having short break in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Standardhotel with higher price”
Reviews.Author: mba4u
Reviews.Content: This hotel is situated in the heart of Singapore - the Orchard Road. It's a typical Holiday Inn hotel with good facilities. Only the prices are too high. Priority Club Platinums are not able to receive extraordinary benefits as per discision of the hotel management. The room was nice with a brand new flat screen TV, nice bathroom and a nice wardrobe. Next door the hotel you find a very good Food Yard with all of different food: Western, Thai, Chinese, Indian, Italian etc. etc. Very good possibilities for shopping and other businesses, the closest Metro Station is the Sunset with the red NorthSouth line. To the hotel management: Please reconsider your price policy and the treatment for Priority Club Platinums. Then you would have more satisfied guests!

Reviews.Title: “Much better than I imagined”
Reviews.Author: Montville03
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with two young children and were very happy with our four day stay. The location is central and near Somerset station. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable and the beds/pillows were great. The staff were friendly and helpful at all times. We had 'club' access which allowed us access to the club room for 'high tea', which was a rather grand description for what was a restricted menu of tuna sandwiches and fruit. The pool was nice and not overcrowded. A steam room and very nice sauna is also available. Staff are very good with children and toys/play area are provided in both breakfast locations. Highly recommended for those with young children.

Reviews.Title: “Very Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: drbijlani
Reviews.Content: I stayed in holiday inn from 22nd december 2010 to 26th december 2010 and the moment we stepped in the hotel was greeted with so much hospitality and within few mins was in the wonderful premier room, we had booked with a travel agent from mumbai. i was staying with my wife and my 2 yr old child and they pampered my child very much with everyday some small toys and there was a play area in the breakfast restaurant. they gave us a pigeon gift hamper, a christmas gift on 25th morning. all our travel arrangements were taken care of including sight seeing the bookings and all took place through a concierge desk and they arranged for an outside taxi and also guided us through various malls and mrt (subway trains). One suggestion i would like to make that do not go for corner rooms as though their square feet maybe the same they appear congested thus we changed the room when we were offered a corner room and they did it with immediate effect.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Christmas Stay”
Reviews.Author: prenns
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel over Christmas and had a wonderful time. We are a family with four young children and stayed in two adjoining rooms. The lobby had been beautifully decorated for the season and on Christmas Day there was a Santa with a 'helper' handing out gifts to the children. The hotel was very clean and well maintained. We had spacious rooms and comfortable beds. Our only complaint was that one of our rooms was a smoking room, but the staff tried hard to remove the smell. Without being asked, someone came in and replaced the curtains. Overall, the staff were very helpful and courteous. We arrived early and before our rooms were ready, but the staff took our luggage and made sure they were taken to our rooms. The pool area is great for kids and parents, with a kiddie pool and a separate deeper pool. There is also plenty of shade, with chairs and tables to relax and watch the kids play. The hotel is in a great location, slightly off Orchard, but with easy access. It is also within walking distance of Little India, though others might disagree with our definition of 'walking distance'. (Our group included 5, 7, and 8 year olds.) I would recommend this hotel for families with young children. We had a great time and will return the next time we stay in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located hotel, nicely renovated”
Reviews.Author: jonlee7447
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a night while visiting family. Coming from the US, I find this hotel comparable to a very nice 4-star property. Just off Orchard Road and right in the heart of Singapore's shopping paradise. The renovated rooms are nice and quiet with comfortable beds complimented with "firm" and "soft" pillows and appropriately labeled. The concierge arranged for my taxi to the airport at 5:00 am the next day and it was there promptly. A negative point to this otherwise pleasant review is that I was charged SIN$30 for an additional person in my room even though I had checked in myself and stayed by myself. Several emails to the hotel requesting a refund have proven futile.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly Located Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ticketmuc
Reviews.Content: Stayed several times at the holiday inn near orchard road. They recently rebuilt all the rooms and they have a very modern and stylish decor. Breakfast is delicious with view to a nearby park (and highway) The service was friendly as always and the bonus program of the holiday inn is really great because I got three nights for free after my stay in this hotel. Overall, there is nothing negativ I could say about this hotel

Reviews.Title: “cold reception”
Reviews.Author: nazzim
Reviews.Content: we took a 2 & half hour flight to Singapore, check in to the hotel on eve of my wife birthday celebration, as was expecting the same reception as holiday inn Silom, Bangkok when we stayed there a few month back but left with much to be desired unfortunately, surely the impression was the front office staff have much to learn from their compatriot hospitality back in Thailand..as far as we're concern will try to stay at other hotel when planning on another trip to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic fantastic fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Traveller255097
Reviews.Content: This hotel has amazing service, lovely staff,great concierge and it is in the perfect location. Nothing was too much trouble. It is not on orchard road but a couple of hundred metres away. The perfect spot as it is practically on orchard road but doesn't have the disadvantage of it's noise. The rooms are a good size we also had a cot in the room with no problems for space. We took up the offer of using the executive club. We think it was well worth it. Great breakfast, and nice to stop past and have a drink or snack throughout the day. Also fed the kids there a few nights and was all included in our room price. The hotel is absolutely delightful with the children. There is a main pool and toddler pool. Highly recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location for malls on Orchard Rd , easy access to Somerset MRT.”
Reviews.Author: DoncasterGmac
Reviews.Content: Staff cheerful and helpful. Room comfortable, huge bed,good TV coverage. Believe Wi-fi is expensive but did not use.B'fast is pricey but saving can be made by booking previous evening. All in all a very comfortable standard of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location, great service”
Reviews.Author: ladyloch
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as a stop over to/from England for three nights each way. The hotel is about 4 minutes walk from Orchard Road (through the bar door is the closet way). The rooms are modern and very clean. We had two queen beds and very spacious. It was very quiet so we could sleep during the day to catch up on our sleep. The service was very good and they looked after us perfectly.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for travelling with children”
Reviews.Author: 5gomad
Reviews.Content: Check in a breeze. Room was a good size and ready for us with a cot and three kids toothbrushes of appropriate ages (cute). Club room meant we could go graze at a lovely tea buffet (just the right time for us to have a bedtime snack before we crashed after our long flight from NZ). Children loved the breakfast buffet which included a mini kids buffet and a toy pit. Great location for shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Meets Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Kiran_Nair
Reviews.Content: Right in middle of the Orchard Street Shopping district. Good Staff , always smiliing and cheerful .Internet charges are steep but the speed is high .Breakfast is expensive but spread is excellent

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: saurabh_desai
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. The staff was very efficient/professional and check-in/out was a breeze. Rooms/bathrooms are very clean. The Indian restaurant is also quite good. It is within walking distance from Orchard road.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Travelers with Children..”
Reviews.Author: Ta8
Reviews.Content: Hotel is not on the main orchard road..but its right behind Robinson Dep. store which is on orchard road. Starbucks , 7-11 , pubs etc are right behind the hotel. Its only 5-7 min walk to Takashimiya, Paragon etc. The check in was very smooth and took us only 5 min as it was booked through travel agent. Rooms are big compare to Singapore standards and their 2 Queens size beds are comfortable for even 2 adults to sleep on 1 bed. They even arrange for children amenties in the room like robe, children tooth brush & paste , milo drinks etc. Concerige are very good and have basically all the knowledge about the attractions, shopping, eating etc.. Will surely stay there again...

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: RN717
Reviews.Content: Great location and service. Pleasant staff. Internet rates are a bit expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Above and beyond service!”
Reviews.Author: familyof41
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Singapore with three generations, and four kids age 1 to 11 and 10 total people. One of the adults in my group became very sick and had to go to the hospital. The front desk called the hospital ahead of time, paid for our taxi to the hospital and continuously checked in with us to make sure she was ok. We also got a card and desserts from the staff. Breakfast buffet at the hotel was plentiful, lots of variety between American, European, and Asian foods. A great choice for kids! They also gave the 1 year old toys to play with and had a special kids buffet. The breakfast buffet and the free drinks/appetizers were worth the upgrade to the Executive Club or whatever they call it. The pool was great and there is even a small kids pool for the really little ones. The location is just a short walk to all the shopping and restaurants. The service was much like staying at a friend's home. Very caring and considerate and very professional! If I make it back to Singapore, this is the only place we will stay.

Reviews.Title: “Last minute perfection”
Reviews.Author: Auris57
Reviews.Content: Whilst on our extended trip out to Malaysia and Aus. we bobbed in and out of Singapore a few times. On this occasion somewhere in the middle of the trip we landed in Singapore without anywhere to stay. So after a little help from hotel booking desk we booked this place and jumped into a taxi to Orchard road, again. What we didn't realise at the point of booking was just what a superb location this hotel is in. A quick walk through the shopping arcade and out the back door and your straight into what seems like food heaven, a little further and your on Orchard road. The hotel itself was spotless and the staff were friendly and helpful. The room although not entirely spacious was state of the art modern with a bathroom to die for. We tried to book this hotel again on our return trip from Brisbane but without success as it was full. No surprises there. Any return trip to Singapore for us and this will be our hotel of choice.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels we have stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Julimar
Reviews.Content: Had a superb room on the 7th floor overlooking the Presidential Palace gardens. The bed was wider than it was long with a choice of hard or soft pillows. There was a bowl of fruit in the room which was a nice touch. The shower was very powerful and hot, and there were plenty of towels and complimentary toiletries. The staff on the front desk were very pleasant and polite, giving us a map and marking on places of interest. Our flight back did not leave until 01.40 Sunday morning and we could use the showers on the top floor by the pool and gym where toiletries and towels were provided. The buffet breakfast was excellent and set us up for the day. The shops of Orchard Road were 2 minutes walk away, leaving by the back door, and the underground about 2 minutes walk up Orchard Road. All in all an excellent base from which to explore Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice”
Reviews.Author: dazza66
Reviews.Content: A hotel for business or pleasure – family friendly. Stayed 2 nights at the end of September in an executive room with access to club lounge (kids welcome). Rooms are comfortable and modern. Good range of options for breakfast although the club lounge was quieter than the restaurant and had very similar options but you’re in Singapore so don’t feel obliged to take a breakfast option – plenty of excellent and cheap food options nearby. Canapes and drinks served in club lounge 6pm to 8pm – excellent! Good location just off Orchard road and not far from Somerset and Dhoby Gaut MRT. Only minor drawback is that the area has narrow streets which jam up easily leading to frustrated drivers honking their horns day or night! Light sleepers should ask for a room on the expressway side of the building which seems quieter. Noticeable improvement in service levels since our visit in November last year. Many thanks to Sheena and Ivy in the club lounge for their wonderful service. Not a cheap hotel but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “holiday inn always perfect”
Reviews.Author: travelingmadam
Reviews.Content: stayed last year for another nostalgic memory with Holiday Inn. first time stayed at Holiday Inn Singapore was ten or twelve years ago when it's name was still Holiday Inn park view. years gone by and decided to stay again with new name. all I could say is just pure perfect. it never disappoint me at all. the staffs were amazing. room was new improvement and it was just great. very clean, minimalistic decor without having to appear as stressed out. another thing I loved bout this hotel is it's swimming pool and gym which were located on the rooftop. and the breakfast also, splendid. plenty of selections and i could still find my personal favorite food even it was a visit more than couple of years. location was another thing too. just minutes away from bustling street of Orchard and plenty of shopping centers that will surely empty your cash in just minutes. also a walk nearby is lots and lots of food stalls with local and int'l delicacy as well. MRT and bus station also nearby which is good as well. definitely will be back to HI again when I have a long holiday and when i am going to spend around Orchard area only. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a conference - and for shopping!”
Reviews.Author: Lennelovestravel
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel as part of a team conference, which combined both formal meetings plus team building activities. The location of this hotel is excellent as it's so close to Orchard Road plus it's been refurbished so the rooms were modern and spacious. Breakfast was sensational with everything you could want! I would recommend this to basically everyone - maybe not for honeymooners - as it's not overly romantic... But just an overall good hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for families”
Reviews.Author: bwana72
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed in this hotel for 8 nights in early September. There are 2 adults & 2 kids so we got a room with 2 double beds. The rooms are very spacious for Singapore & great value. After reading other reviews, we asked for a non-smoking room away from the lift area & also one that was not near the night life. There's a safe in each room & power converters so you can just plug an Aussie power cord right in. The MRT is only a few minutes away & there are heaps of restaurants/food courts just outside the hotel. As the hotel is only a street away from Orchard Road everything is at your fingertips. The rooftop pool was a big hit with the kids. Wireless internet was very expensive (S35 pd) but if you are only checking emails, you could use the business centre for 50c per minute. Otherwise you can buy a wireless modem sim card at some of the 7 eleven stores. The room was clean & modern. Staff were so friendly & helpful. The breakfast was amazing & the restaurant was great. We will definitely be coming back!

Reviews.Title: “Prompt Service, Great Location, Expensive, Not Your Father's Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: rikerd
Reviews.Content: As a freuent user of Holiday Inn's, I was given an upgrade to a suite; it was nicely appointed, but had a strong "smoker's smell". I asked the desk for a change of bedding and housekeeping responded promtly. Internet access is available for an extra charge, as is breakfast. Ask about the Business / Exective floor; where breakfast, internet and snacks are included. The location can't be beat, with shopping, entertanment, and dinning options for all tastes.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel at a good location”
Reviews.Author: xirxy
Reviews.Content: Singapore is expensive. If you keep this in mind the holiday inn orchard city centre is a good choice (it is also not that cheap). It is located centrally, offers clean rooms, and the breakfast is very good. The hotel itself is no eyecatcher, and you will probably have a "great view" to a highway. The pool is OK, if you travel with cildren they will love to have a pool after a long Singapore tour.

Reviews.Title: “Will Be Back!”
Reviews.Author: docregistrar
Reviews.Content: Stayed here previously (November 2009) an was not dissapointed the 2nd time around. Rooms were great - clean and modern. Location was excellent - near Orchard road and MRT stations.Will still be top of our list when we come back to Singapore!

Reviews.Title: “The Typical Holiday Inn Experience”
Reviews.Author: mai_a216
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for 5 nights, got their special weekend rate on the hotel's site for an executive room with 2 double beds. I have stayed in other Holiday Inn hotels, and must say that overall it was the typical Holiday Inn experience. Nothing really great to make noise about, and nothing that bad to merit a negative feedback. Executive lounge was appropriately equipped with coffee machine, wine chiller, and wifi. Breakfast was ho-hum as it had the usual everyday of eggs, bacon, sausages, breads. Cocktails was served 6-8pm everyday which included wine and some sushi. Room had musty beddings which surprised me because we stayed in a fairly newly renovated room. But it was solved as I had the beddings changed. Our package included 2 pcs laundry everyday and it was promptly given back before 6pm. Location was just a corner away from Orchard Rd which gave it a plus in my opinion. The only glitch I had about this whole experience was about booking. I had booked a few weeks prior to our arrival on their special weekend rate and was disappointed to see a slightly lower rate for the same room a week before our arrival. I called the hotline which then gave me the number directly to the hotel in Singapore so that I may have the rate adjusted. I called them and they said that since I booked it on that rate I couldn't have it adjusted. This kind of irritated me as I am a priority club member and thought they should have been more accommodating on this as other hotel chains who have lowest booking guarantee on their sites usually honor a cheaper rate when it turns up. I would stay in this hotel again if I find a good rate. I would not however give it such an excitedly awesome review as others have. For me it was standard for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and great location.”
Reviews.Author: Laugan2
Reviews.Content: This was our stopover hotel for our trip on to Australia. Lovely modern interior, great rooftop pool and gym. Great little shop inside with a lovely friendly lady behind the counter. Nice and clean rooms and bathrooms. Book breakfast before you go as it was $40 just for a continental breakfast in our room, each. Only a $20 taxi fare from airport to the hotel and a two minute walk to Orchard Road for shopping and food. Excellent hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel in great Orchard Road location”
Reviews.Author: topendgirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel with 2 children aged 7 and 4. Another family were travelling with us with 3 children, aged 3-7. We chose this hotel mainly as it would take 4-5 of us in one room but also as it was a reasonable price (found everything was expensive in Singapore) and in a good location. When we arrived we discovered it was closer to Orchard Rd than it looked on a map and was a gorgeous hotel. The Good: The room was lovely with 2 queen (or were they kings - can't remember) beds and very clean. We didn't find out room to be noisy at all although we could see the expressway. The staff were helpful and polite. We saw the Fitness room but unfortuantely didn't have time to use it. We did however use the pool, which was nothing special but suited us for a dip after a long day out and about in Singapore. The children's pool was a good size and was warmer than the main pool. We didn't use the restarant/bar etc as we ate out at the stalls or food courts nearby. In a great location very close to Orchard Road - short walk (a few minutes with young kids) to shops and food stalls. The bad: ...hmmm... oh, the tiles around the pool were slippery and the kids slipped over a couple of times.

Reviews.Title: “Suited all our needs”
Reviews.Author: holme
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for four nights as part of a self drive holiday round Singapore and Malaysia. Got a good deal on the hotel through our agent Danny, at Simply Malaysia, who also sorted out the other hotels and car hire for us, and was very knowledgable about the areas we wanted to visit. The Holiday Inn was a very enjoyable start to our holiday. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived, so we had a wander around the local area and visited the Tourist Information Centre which is about a 5 minute walk away on Orchard Road. Our room had two double beds and was a good size. The beds were extremely comfortable and the standard of cleanliness was very high. Breakfast was included in our room rate, and was very good - a buffet including a wide range of Western and Asian food. A nice touch was a mini breakfast bar for children, with special brightly coloured utensils and milk shakes, muffins etc. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. If it's raining (an experience in itself!) you can borrow hotel umbrellas from the concierge desk. We got a cab from the hotel to the Night Safari which cost about £10. This is a definite must see - one of the highlights of our trip. Otherwise we got around on the MRT, using a card which we bought at the station - really good value. The trains are incredible - the cleanest, coolest and easiest to negotiate we've been on. Singapore is a fantastic city with loads to do and see, and the Holiday Inn is in a great location from which to explore.

Reviews.Title: “Best location”
Reviews.Author: didiahmed
Reviews.Content: Fully refurbished, Modern, clean, excellent location in the heart of Orchard Road just behind Centre Point shopping mall, Tandoor Restaurant at the basement offers delicious North India food!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Spotlessly Clean and Modern”
Reviews.Author: millymole
Reviews.Content: Just had a 2 night stay at this hotel. Great location on Orchard Road, walking distance to MRT and close to all the shopping. We had a room for 2 adults and 2 children. All immaculate, modern and new. Would thoroughly recommend for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful”
Reviews.Author: Tullagirl
Reviews.Content: We arrived at this hotel early in the morning after a long flight from London. The receptionist appologized as our room was not ready but told us to use the showers on the 7th. floor where there were lovely towels and toileties it was very much appreciated. Our room was ready within the hour and the service was excellent. Nothing was a bother for the staff who were all very friendly. The beds and pillows were very confortable and everything was so clean. The staff in the restaurant where we had breakfast were very friendly and helpful. The food choices for both breakfast and dinner at night was very good. Next time I go to Singapore this is the hotel that I will be staying at.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, very clean, staff very friendly”
Reviews.Author: Linoliv
Reviews.Content: The location was fantastic - off Orchard Road, near the MRT and near restaurants and also cheaper cafes. Couldn't ask for more. Both our room and bathroom were very clean, the staff were very friendly and the concierge was very helpful. The concierge gave us the very handy tip re the shuttle service to the Night Safari and also checked our flight was still on time. We stayed two to a bed; they were double beds and after staying in a king size bed in Penang, they felt small but at the end of the day, we got what we paid for. Although we were booked in as two adults and two children, the room only had two of everything, which was remedied upon a call to room service but took a while for everything to arrive - which didn't bother us, just meant lots of calls! The sound of the night club opposite meant falling asleep took a while - this was probably our only (minor) grievance.

Reviews.Title: “Club rooms & lounge are worth the extra”
Reviews.Author: Redjazz68
Reviews.Content: Stayed on the club floor. Issues checking in as we were given two beds although we’d asked for a King room. Took ages to get the room sorted. We were finally given a suite room, which was very comfortable and spacious. Club lounge is good. Free WiFi in lounge but not in the club rooms, doesn’t make sense to me. Free snacks all day and then drinks in the evening. Breakfast was available in the lounge too. Location is easy walking distance to Orchard Road. This is the second time we have stayed here. It is expensive for where it is but they often do specials, we got the club room for the same price as a standard room, definitely good value.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Lovetravcl
Reviews.Content: It is a great location and really comfy stay and place smells nice unlike some hotels. I would recommend you to stay here but book in advance as its a bit pricey if u leave it last minute.

Reviews.Title: “Ok, but service need improvement.”
Reviews.Author: jap55
Reviews.Content: Overall location ok, 5 minutes walk to Orchard. Nice room, new renovated. No smile at all when i checked in, also no help from anybody at concierge when my wife carrying bag from taxi. Also, receptionist surprised me when she asked both me and my wife passports. No explaination when i asked why, since this is unusual. Another minus point was, when i asked for shortcut to orchard road, she have me wrong direction. Breakfast way too ordinary for 4stars hotel,i know other 3stars hotel have better breakfast at singapore. Also, place we had breakfast is not big, so always full when we had our breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “GO EXECUTIVE!!”
Reviews.Author: woody121966
Reviews.Content: Stayed here twice before it was renovated and returned because of location, size of rooms and service we received on these previous occassions. This time there were 8 of us - me, hubby, 4 kids and 2 grandparents. We booked 2 executive double/double rooms to accommodate all of us for 6 nights. There was enough space for 4 persons in the rooms, though not many drawers for storing clothes. Flat tv build into wall unit, dvd player, Ipod dock etc I would definately recommend upgrading to executive rooms, I think we were only about an extra £20 a night per room and we cetainly made the most of the - - complimentary breakfast - free wifi in the exec lounge (& use of hotels laptops) - 2 laundry items per day - tea/coffee/biscuits during the day in lounge - complimentary drinks and hot/cold/sweet/savoury canopies between 6 & 8 every night in the executive lounge. We went to the here on most nights rather than go out for tea as we all (including the kids) liked the variety of plentiful hot & cold snacks laid on and us adults love a glass of wine or 3 in the evening! It was a case of help yourself if you liked. Considering a glass of wine at the bar downstairs was about £7 (because of the poor £) we definately got our moneys worth! Had to get there by 6 to get a seat though! We used the hotel pool daily which was really quiet and clean, only downside was the spa pool wasnt working (this seems to be long term from previous reviews) Only a 3 minute walk to nearest shopping malls and MRT, so very convenient. Staff very pleasant as well. (7/11 just across road as well) Will definately return again!

Reviews.Title: “Newly renovated hotel in center of shopping malls”
Reviews.Author: SilverDog_7
Reviews.Content: Holiday Inn Orchard City Center is an old hotel but totally renovated. The rooms are similar to the newer hotels we stay in Bangkok. The photo you see in the website is exactly what it looks like. The twin bed was a good size double bed so its very comfortable. The only downside was the room service. It takes almost half an hour to bring a bucket of ice and the reception did not bring welcome fruit basket although it was indicated in our accomodation voucher. Breakfast selection was typical and the entrees was bland (chicken, grilled salmon and the dimsums). If you are staying for three nights, take your breakfast here once and for the rest of your stay go explore the nearby restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel - Highly Recommend”
Reviews.Author: moju1972
Reviews.Content: The hotel's location is superb. The bustling Orchard Road is only a 2-minute walk. The airport is 15 to 20 minutes by taxi. The room was newly refurbished with a flat screen TV. The bathroom was squeaky clean. The service was professional and friendly. The hotel staff are well trained in the legendary Singaporean hospitality. Breakfast was a good buffet spread, but nothing exceptional, though quite a wide variety of continental and local cuisine. There was a problem with the billing which took several telephone calls and many e-mails to sort out after our return home.

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel”
Reviews.Author: l0uise123
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel - you will not be disappointed. This hotel has customer service down to a tee and the rooms and facilties are spotless. The pool area is particulalry lovely - with a children's pool and a larger pool - and the gym facilities are good too. It is just set back off a main thoroughfare so we asked for a quiet room and were never disturbed by noise. Orchard Road is just round the corner so it is great for shopping/eating out etc.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, would recommend to all.”
Reviews.Author: Iluvtassie
Reviews.Content: We had 3 nights here in early June and were very happy with the hotel. Excellent location so close to Orchard Road. Breakfast was varied and caters to all tastes. Pool and gym were great and the extended pool hours meant a swim after shopping was allowed- under the stars on a clear night! Staff were very helpful with directions and recommendations and we enjoyed some meals at the restaurants out the back of the hotel for a very reasonable price. A very handy location to allow you to get to shopping, touring, eating with out any trouble. Would happily go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Terrific location, great experience, value for money”
Reviews.Author: SoumenKolkata
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 5 nights in Holiday Inn Singapore earlier this week. We are a family of 4 including two boys - one teenager and the other 6 yrs. Before we had zeroed in on this hotel, we had made extensive use of the reviews to compare and contrast. This hotel seemed to be offering the best value for money with a great location advantage. Having spent much of our vacation (barring one night when we stayed in Sentossa), I would vouch strongly for the benefits. This hotel is virtually on Orchard Road - it is a brisk 3 mins walking distance away. The Somerset MRT is 5 mins walking - something that is key to a convenient Singapore stay. The rooms that we had were spacious enough to accomodate all of us comfortably and overlooked the express way and the istana Park. The breakfast lounge was a little cramped (as expressed by many others), but the quality and variety was very pleasant. All in all - great stay and would love to go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Has it all”
Reviews.Author: vastgotta
Reviews.Content: This hotel is probably not the fanciest around town, but it has all features to have a great Singapore holiday/business stay. 20min from the airport, 5 min by foot from Orchard roads and close to 2 of the newest shopping centre there. Walking distance to many good restaurants. Also the staff is very attentive. The food in the hotel restaurant is OK but nothing special. Rather cross the street for a meal.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely pleasant staff... had a great stay”
Reviews.Author: kguneet
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Holiday Inn, Orchard Road with my mother in July 2009. The hotel was extremely comfortable. The staff is very helpful and pleasant. We were given a room several hours before the check-in time, at no extra cost. They did not have non-smoking room available in the category that I had booked, so they upgraded my room, again without any extra charges. The staff was helpful in guiding us about the local attaractions, the way to the malls and the nearest MRT. The hotel stay was also extremely comfortable and room service and house keeping was very efficient. We used to feel totally relaxed when we returned to our room in the evening after sight-seeing around Singapore all day. Holiday Inn made our Singapore holiday really memorable. I'll definitely stay at Holiday Inn when I visit Singapore again.

Reviews.Title: “Location - good for Orchard Road but noise from bars/nightclubs”
Reviews.Author: sandrajc
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel because it offered a family room (2 double beds). We stayed on a smoking floor because it would have cost more to have a non-smoking room (can't work out why it would be more expensive). There was a smell of stale smoke but we did get used to the smell. The room was a typical hotel room - nothing special and nothing terrible. I loved the shower and bath but it was difficult to get into due to the high and wide barrier. The shower head was great - strong spray that you could adjust as required. The staff were friendly. The pool was medium sized and set up nicely with shaded seats and sunlounges. The spa pool was out of order when we were there. I had to use the Business Centre internet twice. It was explained to me that the costs were 50 cents per minute so I tried to keep my use right down. It was not explained to me how to actually 'stop the clock' (end the session) - so both times I was caught out paying extra. They charge for part minutes as well - so I paid for a full minute while trying to work out how to stop the clock - I had gone 7 seconds over (the first time the staff member stopped the clock when I went looking for them). Anyway my recommendation is to go out and find an internet cafe - don't bother with the Business Lounge at all. The location for shopping and food on Orchard Road is excellent .... the only problem is we were kept awake at night by the nightclubs at the back of the hotel. Also, there are a few sex shops in the vicinity - not so great for families. However, these can be avoided by going through the plaza at the back of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, pleasant rooms, very helpful and attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: pjvanvox
Reviews.Content: My colleagues and I stayed at the Parkview for two nights in late May; well actually I'm sitting in the room now typing ;). The hotel is conveniently located across the street from our local offices so it is very convenient. The hotel is also 1 KM away from Orchard Road shopping--although I haven't had a chance to walk over that way. The lobby is spacious and pleasant with a bar area across one side facing Cuppage Road. The front desk staff is helpful, welcoming and pleasant. In fact every staff person I've come across has been friendly and eager to help with anything. THe Rooms are nicely appointed--somewhat in a 2004 Chocolate/blue color scheme. The furniture is comfortable yet somewhat typical of a business hotel. There is a desk, the requisite flat screen television, marble bathroom and various accoutrements (dryer, coffee maker etc.). Love the shower! Hate the bed--what is it a slab of rock with a pad over it? ugh. I have asked housekeeping and received 6 additional pillows to create my own mattress pad. Well it works! All in all a relaxing place to stay however.

Reviews.Title: “Extra charge by the IHG hotels”
Reviews.Author: cyrus22
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this hotel as we have done many times before, but this time we were charged and extra $30.00 a night for the second person. I have never heard of this before. Apparently this is now the common practice in Asia and internationally, that this hotel chain will charge the extra $30.00. I cannot understand why, we booked a room for 2 people which included breakfast for 2 people. I have the confirmation saying that it is for 2 people, yet they are now saying that more than one person in a room is an extra charge. When you have 2 people in a room you pay an extra $30.00. I am really confused that they can advertise a price for 2 people and then slug you another $30.00 a night. I am not sure if I will re book this hotel again. We all should write to these hotels and complain, as I cannot understand how they can justify this charge. Please everyone we need to complain and be heard. Now that this hotel chain has started this charge all the others will follow. Our holidays will end up costing more and it is hard enough now to try and have a holiday without the hotels adding extra charges to our bill.

Reviews.Title: “The staff is the best!”
Reviews.Author: Klemensito
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights during our business trip to Singapore. Our room rate included a breakfast buffet, which was a combination of Asian and Western food. We especially liked the fresh fruit juices pressed just for you every morning. Location is very convinient, close to Orchard Road with all the shopping/dining facilities (we reccomend a sushi restaurant in Orchard Central in 6th floor called Sakae Sushi). We also tried some drinks in the lobby bar of the hotel (BTW, very expensive) and in room dining, was a mixture of North Indian and Malaysian kitchen. In our opinion the food tasted very good and was not too expensive either. The pool on the top floor was a great refreshness in the heat and of a good size for those who like to have some space for swimming. We didn't use the fitness center facilities, though it seemed to have a various choices of work out equiptment. Almost forgot to mansion the very helpful and proffesional staff.All in all, we recommend this hotel and would definitly come back again!

Reviews.Title: “Better than most Holiday Inns but let down by location”
Reviews.Author: BhuddaBean
Reviews.Content: Exceeded expectations for a routine (B&B) stopover from Oz . Much better than UK versions. The modest sized room was immaculate, having been upgraded recently with modern flat screen TV sunk into the wall and various electrical gadgets and lighting controls. View of side street from the slightly old windows. Alternative was busy highway at back. Not sure about window security for children and single glazing let in a bit of street noise. Nearby sex shops and young females 'plying their trade', low end street stalls for fast food. Lots of outdoor restaurants and bars, and a stones throw from the famous Orchard Road (south end) with its glitzy shopping. The bathroom was smallish but nice. Only difficulty was to reach the bath taps round the glass shower screen we had to climb into the bath. The staff were friendly and trying hard to please. The pool was lovely and a good size to work off some calories. The 2 small Internet booths were basic. The buffet breakfast was all right except the streetside cafe (not the conference restaurant) was too small and the tables were too crammed together for comfort and privacy. We tried the in-house Tandoori restaurant for a dinner treat. It was. Very nice staff but expensive,, likewise the hotel bar with caberet (of sorts). Our flight was at midnight and although we checked out at 1 pm, we were told we could use the pool changing rooms and shower before heading for the airport in the evening. That's when we heard that all flights to Europe were cancelled, and things started to get very tricky - but that's another story.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Roodboy
Reviews.Content: Centrally located, room was clean and adequate for a holiday stay. Highlight of the hotel is the rooftop pool area. Very large pool and plenty of seating areas both in the sun and undercover. Unfortunately jacuzzi was out of action. Gym area was small and under-equipped but adequate for basic needs. Breakfast selection and quality both good. However having to queue each morning seemed a little unnecessary especially when you could see spare tables. Disorganised staff letting people jump the queue while other families waited patiently tested the patience of plenty of guests. Hotel is worth staying at, was undergoing renovations when we stayed and is an easy walk to all central areas of interest in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: loulang
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 1 night on Easter, after staying for 3 nights in a cheap hotel in Bugis. Check in was swift and Marie from reception granted our request for early check in. Since our request for a room with 2 double beds was not available, she put us in a room with a king bed and put in an extra bed without charge. the room itself was very clean, with comfortable beds and pillows (selection of soft to firm), and the DVD player and ipod dock was a nice touch. Breakfast was very good, I especially like the small buffet table for children where they have the milk and bowls for cereal. We left a bag of souvenirs we bought in Bugis in the taxi, and Morgan (concierge) tried everything he can to get it back, but unfortunately it wasn't returned by the taxi service. This was the only thing that marred our vacation, but otherwise it was well worth the trip. We will definitely go back to this holiday inn, and we'll make sure to stay longer next time.

Reviews.Title: “Standard holiday inn nothing more nothing less”
Reviews.Author: deepsapphyr
Reviews.Content: I stay a lot in holiday inn's around Asia am a priority club member, their upgraded rooms are good, excellent pillows and bedding bathroom nothing special just adequate breakfast should be as in holiday inn silom Bangkok they have by at the best bfast of any holiday inn tv doesn't have enough channels yo my taste but all in all ab adequate business hotel would go there again

Reviews.Title: “In Shopping Haven”
Reviews.Author: aimantakkisah
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a nite in March 2010 with small children. The room is spacious with 2 double beds. The hotel is newly renovated nice and modern deco. Parking is free for guest inside the building. The MRT is 5 minute walk very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, Location, and Rooms”
Reviews.Author: dsysana
Reviews.Content: My colleague and I arrived early in the morning and checked in very quickly. Then even (without asking) put us in rooms next to each other. Free bottled water in the rooms every day, thank you. The mini-bar filled the little fridge and I had them remove everything at once (needed space for fruit, a few groceries, chilling water). Awesome water pressure in the shower. Two heads (one up top, one hand held). I had to remove the metal stopper to get it to drain quickly, but no real issue with that. Enough hangers to iron almost two week’s worth of shirts/pants and hang up. A "real" iron and ironing board, not that mini board you have to sit on the bed. TV had HBO and a fox equivalent, but about on par with other international hotels. Zee TV is always a hoot to watch for this westerner. I had a few problems (internet jack didn't work, alarm from a neighbors room going off, power went out in my room (fuse I think), but each item was handled quickly. They actually sent up a staffer with a laptop to troubleshoot the connection and he actually knew what he was doing (I'm also in IT). This was late at night also, so I was very pleased I didn't get them "We'll leave a note for the staff tomorrow" kind of response. Internet was not free, but I am a member of one of their partner providers, so I didn't have to pay. Room service was reasonable, but breakfast at the hotel restaurant was a bit pricey. They had a bit of everything though, from typical western bacon and eggs, to Japanese, Indian and local dishes. Very impressed with the variety. Two little secrets. Eat breakfast at the place around the back near Starbucks. A la carte menu where everything was $1. 2 eggs, 2 strips of bacon, two pancakes, glass of juice, each for $1. For less then a third of what it costs at the hotel (though not as ritzy of course), you can eat pretty good. (see the picture...that plate/juice was $7SGD.) Also, go to "Laundry Day" at the Cuppage mall behind the hotel to get your clothes cleaned. Not sure if they do dry cleaning, but for what the hotel would have charged me around $170 to clean, they did it for $22. Wash-Dry-Fold...almost two weeks of clothes. Other than opening my room door, I almost never touched another door during my stay. Someone was always there to open both the hotel and taxi door. I was told that tipping is not really expected in Singapore, but after a few days at the hotel, I'd say they are OK with it. Nothing big, but I did notice someone tip the concierge and he didn't seem to mind...you know, that closed-palm handoff where you barely see the denomination? Would make a Manhattan door-man proud. So I tipped a bit for a few things including maid service. Most restaurants, though, didn't give you a chance on the credit card slip and I didn't see anyone else around doing it. Staff was very friendly and was eager to help out in any way. Weekend maid service was a bit too eager. One Sunday, even though I had the do not disturb button pushed, they knocked twice and even called later in the evening to see if I wanted to the room cleaned, turn down service and to check to see if the room was cleaned to my liking. I was OK with that, but I'd rather sleep through the interruption. Location off Orchard Road was great. Plenty of shops, restaurants, and a tour guide place (sponsored by the city, I think) within a few blocks. You can pay as much as you want for the high end restaurants, but can get a lot of the same items at the various hawker shops scattered everywhere. A foodie’s dream. Will definitely stay here again when I visit Singapore…

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed the trip immensely!”
Reviews.Author: HarshLoomba
Reviews.Content: The service was very good. breakfast had lot of variety. staff was friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel , but they ripp you off for internet use )”
Reviews.Author: nesse_7
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel , 200 meters from Orchard road. But beware to use the internet they charge you double for using ethernet and wifi. They steal money from you with a smile. For the rest good clean hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice for Singapore Stopovers & Orchard Road”
Reviews.Author: DiggerDeals
Reviews.Content: Short R&R visit. Location to Orchard Road and MRT is the attraction for us. Renovations completed since our last stay and now a dramatically better decor and room furnishings. Bed and linen excellent quality. No noticeable road noise on the higher floors. Executive lounge now much larger and moved to 3rd floor. Wider range of breakfast and evening foods but please add some soy sauce as a condiment choice. Everyone from the staff was helpful and pleasant. Pool was great as always. Probably also time for a new spa or a major refurbishment of the current one - cushions and fittings are looking a bit tired.

Reviews.Title: “Ask for a room away from the expressway!”
Reviews.Author: carletonfisk
Reviews.Content: My wife and two kids stayed at this hotel for three nights. The first room they gave us was facing the expressway (why don't any of the reviews on Trip Advisor mention that half of the hotel faces/overlooks one of the busiest highways in city???). I asked for another room that would be quieter, and they gave us a room on the 3rd floor, on the "quieter" side of the hotel. However, the other side also faces a road, and there was an open air restaurant (open late) about 70 meters from our room. In addition, a large group of men seemed to congregate nightly on the street just outside our room, talking loudly until nearly midnight. All of this, in addition to the screaming drunk guys in the room next to us, playing cards/shouting until 3 in the morning ------ well, it did not make the best impression. Other problems? 1. The hot tub did not look like it had been cleaned in ages, with little brown bits floating everywhere. 2. The pool for children is extremely slippery and very unsafe if children are not very carefully monitored. My daughter (4 years old) lost her balance and could not regain it, because she kept slipping, but luckily I was right there to help her. On the positive side, as others have mentioned, the staff are fine, and the rooms are fine. The breakfast if fine as well, though they close things down precisely at the end of breakfast, in a kind of frenzy. So, overall, a very, very average experience. Granted, the noise issues are a result of a poor location. But, there were a number of others small things that added up over three days, contributing to the overall "average" experience. But, then again, this is the Holiday Inn, so I suppose I should not have gotten my hopes up.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent surprise”
Reviews.Author: elica49
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn was a very good surprise. Excellent service at least at the executive floor, excellent location, excellent room. A good option at Singapore

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise of a Holiday Inn”
Reviews.Author: Lady_Tubs
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel after reading others reviews on tripadvisor. It was central to where we wanted to be, short walking distance to variety of eateries, and short taxi ride to major sights. For 4 adults, a taxi trip is the way to go. The bus station is also just a block away on Orchard Row. We stayed here a total of 4 nights, before & after cruising on RCCL, week of Jan. 13th. The cruise boat arrived early morning back to Singapore, and we were able to check in because the room was ready. We stayed in the double-bed rooms, 4 adults can fit here comfortably well, nothing tight at all about movement. It was very difficult finding a family room that could accommodate 4, and I was pleasantly surprised when we got to our rooms. Chinatown, Little India, Sentosa island, Merlion park, National Botanical Gardens and Orchidarium, and Orchard Row were our targets. Night Safari was a so-so, because it was too dark to see the animals, althou a lot cooler to venture out in the evenings. I had more fun enjoying the Fire-Eaters show. The Waterworld Aquarium on Sentosa island was a hit for kids cause they allow you to feed the sharks & stingrays, but for a fee. The Images of Singapore on Sentosa island had a good museum of city history, and was cool air-con bldg. to hide from the heat. Having an elderly, with a walker/wheelchair in tow, kept our pace slow but nothing was difficult in handling the city terrain. The hawker markets were fun meal-time adventures. Make sure you pick up a map of city for exploring. Will definitly be back !

Reviews.Title: “Good service - attentive staff - comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: Kentishchap
Reviews.Content: We had an executive room which was very comfortable and had a large flat screen TV with DVD player and an iPod dock. We used the latter more as the TV programmes weren't up to much (not the fault of the hotel). The staff were very helpful in moving luggage, ordering taxis, etc. The hotel is a short walk from Orchard Road. Approaching on foot is not straightforward, but taxis are fairly cheap. We used the Tandoor, the restaurant in the basement, and found it really good. The breakfast bar was also good, with a huge range of options.

Reviews.Title: “Good position, good refurbishment, but noise problems”
Reviews.Author: Scotlandscout
Reviews.Content: Used our Priority points to book a room for 2 nights. We chose this hotel mainly on the fact that it had been upgraded recently and the location of the hotel is good. The lobby area is smaller than I expected but welcoming all the same, with a bar area and plenty of nice seating all around. Check in quick and polite but not friendly with no other info on the hotel other than where the lift was. We were however upgraded to a junior suite and given a welcome drink voucher to have in the bar. The room on the 5th was a nice size, I like the new Holiday Inn colours of teal and brown done in a contemporary style with dark wood. A sofa and a large footrest/coffee table and lamp tables in the sitting area with a good sized work desk and chair. A flat screen TV/DVD on the wall which was on a bracket to face the bed or sitting area. A wardrobe which contained the safe and plenty hanging space and draws, but only one pair slippers and one robe. In this small area the mini bar and tea/coffee making facilities. Like the fact that the fridge was a one in which you could take out everything and use it for your own things. 2 bottles of water were complementary also. A full sized hairdryer was in the draw. The bathroom was on the small side but there was plenty of space to place your own things around the sink. Again nicely refurbished and good quality towels, which makes a change! The real problem I found with the bathroom was that whilst the shower is over the bath, which is not usually a problem however as the shower screen is fixed it makes it quite difficult and IMO if you have any mobility problems you would struggle to get in and out of the bath. Really awful shampoo/conditioner and body wash, cheap and nasty. The bed was nice and firm with a good quilt and a choice of hard or soft pillows. Linen very good as well. However we did have a couple of problems. The air-con was broken and the temp in the room was 27dg even though it was switched on. After reporting an engineer came within 5 mins and changed a part and it was working within 20 mins, an inconvenience but was dealt with straight away. The other problem we had, and the staff are aware of it is the noise from a nearby club. A thumping bass greeted us when we arrived back into the room at 11.45pm. It was so loud I thought we were above a nightclub. Rang reception, asked if this would go on for long, the staff as I say know about the problem and apparently the police had been notified to get the club to turn down the music, it did for a while but woke us up just before 3.00am as it had been turned up again. We had been offered another room moving during the night, but we decided to move the next day. Next day without any fuss another room was ready for us, re-packed and our luggage was moved. Again a Junior Suite, different shape, I preferred this one, extra chair a better laid out room, but with the same problem in the bathroom with the fixed screen. the air-con worked fine. No noise that night and slept well, oh and there was a turn-down service, but no paper that morning but a paper the day before, a little inconsistent. Did not have any food in the hotel too many eating places all around but the Indian Restaurant in the hotel did look very swish. The pool area, which we did intend to use but ran out of time, was very nice with lots of chairs/loungers to choose from and plenty in the shade. All in all we did enjoy our stay, mainly due to the refurbishment and everything being new and fresh, however be warned about the music which really should be dealt with. But our complaint was handled well by staff to change rooms, but just a shame it’s a problem. Some staff are quite unfriendly and upon checking out not even a mention about the problems or apology.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for a few days in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: ehvbeen
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights over Christmas in 2 connecting rooms for our family of five. Its location just off Orchard Road was perfect with plenty of restaurants close by and near to transport links. The rooms were really spacious, modern and clean and staff were very friendly. The rooftop pool was beautiful and very welcome after a day's sightseeing. Our rooms overlooked the adjacent dual carriageway from which a certain amount of noise could be heard. We would be happy to return here on future trips.

Reviews.Title: “great location, lousy service”
Reviews.Author: rksd
Reviews.Content: We satyed from Dec21 to dec26, The check -in was great. At 10.00 am we were given a room which was changed immediately on request as the view was of a wall. It was downhill therafter. Breafast on last 2 days was havoc with long queues to get in. Our loo latch was not repaired even after reminders. The daily garbage ( Packing material, bags etc from shopping) put in a bag by the bin was never removed. The space under the desk was FULL BY CHECKOUT. Worst was that the Restaurant close at10.0PM on Xmas eve.We calledf or room service and got cold inedible food at 11.0pm which was wasted.The hotel is well located and beautiful. The rooms are comfortble, even tho the loos are small. I would love to go back if the service was better, Because its NOT a cheap hotel one expects better .By the way " All Day Dining" ends at 11.00pm

Reviews.Title: “Love the aMBIENCE”
Reviews.Author: jpatni
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the Orchad Road and is very near to the MRT station. The hotel ambience is very good. We had visited for Honeymoon in the month of Aug09. The quality of food and room service is very good. They had a very nice Indian Restaurant and you can have all kind of Indian Food served over there. The room has mini bar and Internet facility. They have roof top swimming pool and jim with instructor. The hotel staff is also very good and handle all things quite amicably. The room will cost around 6000 INR if booked in advance. I would surely recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: evara
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my husband for week long Christmas holiday. Loved the location as it was an easy walk to the subway, which makes it easy to get almost everywhere you want to go. Proximity to Orchard Rd where there is lots of shopping and many places to eat. The hotel itself was very nice. We stayed on the third floor and had access to the club room with breakfast in the morning and evening snacks and drinks. The room was quite comfortable and well appointed, nice lobby, nice pool, and outstanding service. Would definitely visit Singapore again and stay in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty much okay except for ...”
Reviews.Author: bettoneyvere
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for two nights in conjunction with a conference. There are lots of really good things about the hotel which has recently been refurbished. The rooms are very nicely appointed with comfortable beds, good desk space, flat screen TVs etc. Great breakfasts ... as well as the usual 'egg station' that one finds in most Asian hotels, there was also a fresh juice bar. Staff generally very helpful. So why the average rating? Two problems for me. The first was that the drain hole in the bathroom floor was covered with coagulated hair and soap which, to me, reflects poor housekeeping. I left a note for the cleaners, on top of the drain hole in case they didn't read english ... but all they did was to leave the note back on the desk in my room. The second problem, which is not the hotel's fault but which was a problem for me anyway, was the noise. The hotel is located right next to Cuppage Terrace which has lots of lovely bars and restaurants, but the noise continues well into the wee small hours ... and despite the double glazing and being on the 7th floor, I could still hear the 'thump' of the music until 2.30 to 3.00 in the morning even on a Monday night. So sleep was impossible. For those who can sleep through noise, this would not be a problem but for me ... a serious difficulty.

Reviews.Title: “The Renovations Work”
Reviews.Author: trikos98
Reviews.Content: With an excellent business center that avails all the amenities for business travel the renovations of the Holiday Inn have made it a much more attractive option compared to the Hilton. The staff is friendly and create a special experience. I would like more options in the gym but the pool is fabulous and made the stay there feel like home

Reviews.Title: “Well located hotel”
Reviews.Author: DDDD4
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very well located. Its located in the heart of Singapore and shopping, bars, restaurants is a short walk. The rooms are nice and spacious. Had a rooftop swimming pool which was very nice. Food is also very good at the hotel. Worth staying at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Hotel close to Orchard road”
Reviews.Author: altShropshire
Reviews.Content: Quality hotel just off the main shopping street excellent roof top pool & gym, good size and clean rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel in convenient location”
Reviews.Author: AndyGB
Reviews.Content: Spent 4 days at this hotel in late October - room was clean and modern, although a little small. Overlooked busy road but wouldn't have known it due to triple glazing! Good breakfast in modern dining room. Spacious reception and bar, staff helpful although sometimes service a little slow ( particularly in pool area) Nice pleasant rooftop pool away from the hustle and bustle of the street. We were a little worried at the reviews which suggested that refurbishment was on-going but we saw no sign of it and enjoyed our stay - would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: CalebL
Reviews.Content: The hotel was extremely clean and has undergone a recent renovation. The rooms are very fresh and updated, suited to travelers from many different countries with in wall power for 110 or 220v with different plugs. The breakfast buffet had food familiar to Americans, British, Australians, Europeans and different Asian countries. The hotel is located across the road from the presidential palace gardens, if you happen to get a room that faces that way you have a nice view, otherwise you have views of the surrounding buildings. There is a lot of shopping withing a short walk, from hawker stalls and tailors to nice department stores and high end shops. There is a higher end food court out the door from the lobby bar(Lebanese, Indian, Japanese and The Cable Car bar has free wifi too). There are lots of inexpensive food choices in the surrounding buildings. There is a good grocery store called Cold Storage in a near by building that has good sushi cheap and cold beer much cheaper then any bar. The rooftop pool is very nice and great for lounging. The only downside is the Internet is pretty expensive, but you can use the wifi at the Cable Car to check your email with your beverage. Also the money changer on the entry floor of Cuppage plaza has calling cards that are cheap. The Sunshine card gives several hours of calling to the US for $10 Sing.

Reviews.Title: “Modest but high quality business hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: RhysA
Reviews.Content: Since the hotel upgrades this hotel has now become an excellent first choice for Singapore at times when the more upscale chains (Marriott, Hilton, etc) keep bumping up their prices. The rooms are very nice (although still with some remnants of the old style), the service is perfectly adequate, and the location good for access to Orchard Road. Internet and all food is rather pricey though if purchased separately.

Reviews.Title: “Words cannot describe the elegance and warmth.”
Reviews.Author: maggie_girl26
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay at the Holiday Inn Park View as the previous place we had stayed at in Singapore was so bad we just could not face another night there. This hotel was recommended by a lovely lady at a great service centre called Hotel Reservations at Changi Airport. The price was good as was the location. What we did not anticipate was the sheer luxury or the amazing service offered by this wonderful hotel. We took the "Executive Club" option which for S$78 gave us a 6pm check out, very handy since our flight out was 8.20pm, choice of places to have complimetary breakfast. Complimentary drinks and finger foods, free internet and more. Room service must be experienced to be believed. This hotel is beautiful and these people know how to do everything just right. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad - but nothing exceptional either”
Reviews.Author: Sim038
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights, first time in Singapore. The room was larger than we thought and we were grateful for the two double beds. I would recommend to anyone to get a room away from the lifts - they make this unnecessary "ding" each time. It was very irritating as we could hear it through the walls. They must of been renovating upstairs as we could hear hammers etc during the day. It didn't bother us, but if you plan to sleep during the day I wouldn't recommend it. They also put us in a connecting room - again, ask for one without a connecting door. Sound does travel. The breakfast staff ALL (except the lady manager) need to be retrained. The tables weren't set properly and it was hit and miss if they asked if you wanted a coffee. The restaurant where they serve breakfast is also very small and makes it hard to maneuver around chairs and tables. We also weren't that rapt with the choice of food. The location is good as it's just off Orchard Road. I would also recommend to anyone NOT to eat at the restaurants near by, they cost a fortune and the food was dreadful at the Mexican restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “RECOMMEND HOLIDAY INN PARK VIEW ANYTIME !!”
Reviews.Author: AkilG
Reviews.Content: I have been to Singapore several times and finally settled on this hotel. The staff are friendly and ready to help. They will do anything for you - tours, find best restaurants in the city and even get you durian !! Rooms are recently renovated so are quite modern and very clean. Best part is winding down at night. The hotel has excellent singer Rona at the bar in the lobby area. She remembers all guests and always welcomes you back! Amazing memory ! The hotel is very near to the shopping street of Singapore - the Orchard street. This is perfect hotel for business traveller – neat, quite and so many close eateries just behind the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good location but service lacking”
Reviews.Author: SuebeePerth
Reviews.Content: Having stayed here a couple of times on both occasions the reception staff are very disinterested and not welcoming at all. The room we were checked into was not ready and it seemed too much for housekeeping to come and solve the problem. We stay as it is in a great location and the renovations are excellent. Don't expect out of their way service or even expected service from this hotel but do expect a clear, modern and centrally located hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing - would definitely return!”
Reviews.Author: megjo
Reviews.Content: The room was exceptional (one of the refurbished ones). Although we were a family of 4 sharing (boys are 14 and 7) we never felt cramped. The location is perfect for shopping and eating and accessing the MRT. Breakfast was of a very high standard and the staff at the door, check-in, breakfast and the pool/gym were friendly and helpful. If we were to return to Singapore we would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic in every way”
Reviews.Author: normellen
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from 8 nights at this hotel and cannot fault it in any way. We arrived at 4am, check in was swift and friendly. Our room was fabulous, outstanding value as there were four of us sharing the two double beds (two adults, two children). The room was immaculate and spacious, great aircon, huge LCD tv, dvd player and great bathroom. The pool area is lovely and open to 11pm which was wonderful after a hard day of shopping. The gym overlooks the pool and is very well equipped. The location is fantastic, an easy 2 minute stroll to Orchard Road. The staff were incredible, so polite and attentive. Renovations were still underway but in no way inconvenienced us. Can't comment on the food in the hotel as we ate out all the time, although the children managed to try most of the mocktails on the cocktail menu, all of which were thoroughly enjoyed! The only slight issue was that our room overlooked a nightclub (more likely a lap dancing club given the attire of the ladies outside touting for business!!) and on a few occassions the music went on all night (despite strict laws against this). However we were so exhausted that this didn't phase us, however if it bothers you just call reception and security will report the club. We mentioned it when we checked out and the hotel manager assured us it would be dealt with. I would definitely return to this hotel and have already recommended it anyone who will listen!! We made our booking through Booking.com (6 months in advance) and got a real bargain.

Reviews.Title: “I thought good Singapore hotels were meant to be expensive?”
Reviews.Author: jwarthur
Reviews.Content: This place is fantastic. You feel very relaxed there. Pool area is comfortable, It's about 40 meters from the main shopping district of Orchard road. There are some fantastic places to eat just near by. If you get a room on the south side (facing the city) the views are great. The 'business' rooms are also very comfortable. It has one of the most pleasant business centres I've been in. Resturant and room service is pricy, but the food near by is so much better and cheaper why would you want to eat in the hotel? I've stayed there 3 times and each time I've not paid more than $180 (au) per night. My last stay (in Sept) I paid $100 with a deal through Priority club. Who say's nice, room Singapore hoels are expensive?

Reviews.Title: “Under renovation - but it was still very good”
Reviews.Author: Werckmeister
Reviews.Content: I was staying there in June when the hotel was still under renovation. Nevertheles, this Holiday Inn (which I didn't have much of an expection of, to be frank) surprised me. The reception greeted me as a Priority Gold member, and I had a very nice room with a good view. Loved the iPod stereo hook-up! The room isn't very big, but all the amenitiess were there. Location-wise it was perfect - near Orchard Rd and a bunch of late-nite massage places, which was great since I have trouble sleeping due to my shoulder pains, and I found a Chinese sifu who could undo the knots in my neck for me. It's reasonably priced and overall a very good stay. I'd go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great new renovated rooms”
Reviews.Author: ridgePerth
Reviews.Content: I just stayed at the Holiday Inn Park View in Singapore for 2nights and I really enjoyed the new renovated rooms. I was lucky enough to be upgraded to a club room. After reading the reviews I knew to ask to a room away from the renovations and the staff were very accommodating, The room was very modern with flat screen TV, desk area, big window overlooking a park and the service was excellent, very friendly and efficient. They couldn't do any more to help. The hotel is still under renovation and you need to be prepared for the lobby area as it's quite small as most of it is still hidden. The breakfast restaurant is a big gloomy downstairs with no windows and the food is ok similar to other 4 stars hotels. The location is very good, 5mn from busy Orchard road. The pool area is really nice. Overall a very pleasant stay,

Reviews.Title: “Recommended for family !!”
Reviews.Author: reclat
Reviews.Content: Hotel location is pretty good, short walking distance to major shopping, Orchard Road. Hotel staff is incredible, we arrived early in the morning, our room was not ready yet, but the receptionist lady gave us complimentary buffet breakfast. We were told the hotel is under some renovating job, so we will be expecting some noise during the day. After had our breakfast, still our room not ready yet, so we decide to stroll around Orchard Road, back to the hotel in the afternoon, the lady informed us that the hotel manager offer us free upgrade to executive room because they can't find room with 2 DBs as our request. :) seems like our lucky day !! Our stayed was fantastic, this hotel is still value for money especially if you travel with kids, finding hotel that allowed 2 Children in one room, is quite hard in S'pore if you are budget wise like me. For sure, i will stay at this hotel again for my trip to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Medical travel made easy- a report from a grateful guest!”
Reviews.Author: cdnkittykat
Reviews.Content: My husband had to travel to Singapore for a medical procedure (we live in Jakarta) and I was extremely anxious about where he spent his recovery time before he had to travel home as I was unable to spend the entire stay with him. After careful online research, I selected the Holiday Inn Parkview based on the Club Room services and access to StarCricket (my husband HAD to watch the Ashes while bed-ridden ;-) ). After experiencing the level of service and facilities, I am confident that I simply could not have made a better choice. From the moment the front door staff ever-so carefully assisted him out of the taxi (and into a wheelchair they provided), I knew he was in good hands!
